HITCHES

HITCH REAR BUMPER
REV-XP, XM – 146”
REV-XP, XM – 154”
REV-XP, XM – 163”
REV-XP, XM – 174”
860200953 • Black
860200954 • Black
860200955 • Black
860201135 • Black
•	 Heavy-duty aluminum bumper for hitch applications.
•	 Easy attachment with no cutting or drilling. 
•	 Doesn’t fit Grand Touring SE, LE.
HITCH REAR BUMPER 
REV-XS, XR, XP – 120” and 137”
REV-XS MXZ – 129”
REV-XS Renegade X-RS, XM Freeride, XU Tundra – 137”
REV-XS, XP, XR, XU Tundra – 120” and 137”
860200952 • Black
860201306 • Black
860201307 • Black
860200803 • Black*
•	 Heavy-duty aluminum bumper for hitch applications.
•	 Easy attachment with no cutting or drilling. 
•	 Doesn’t fit Grand Touring SE, LE.
*Does not fit on 137” Freeride.
HEAVY-DUTY HITCH REAR BUMPER
REV Gen4 (Wide) 24”
REV Gen4 (Wide) 20”
860201942
860201795
•	 Essential for modular towing options.
•	 Provides complete rear protection.
•	 Features convenient hand-gripping area.
•	 Adds towing capacity of 300 lb (136 kg),  
up to 1,500 lb (680 kg) total.
•	 1 1/4” hitch receiver included.
HEAVY-DUTY TONGUE HITCH 
REV Gen4 20” and 24”, XU 20” and 24” 
860201023 • Grey
•	 Cast stainless steel construction.
•	 Mounting pattern for Heavy-Duty Hitch Rear Bumpers and 
Multi-Mount Drawbars.
•	 Fits on Heavy-Duty Rear Bumper 20” and 24”  
(860201795, 860201942)
•	 Fits on Multi-Mount Drawbar.
C-TYPE HITCH 
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 16”, XP, XR, XS, XM, XU Tundra
860201381
•	 Heavy-duty C-type hitch works in conjunction with  
hitch rear bumper.
TONGUE TYPE HITCH
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 16”, XP, XR, XS, XM, XU Tundra
860200902
•	 Heavy-duty tongue type hitch works in conjunction with 
hitch rear bumper.
HITCH TONGUE
511000521
•	 Easily transforms the C-Type Hitch (860201381) into  
a tongue-type hitch.
CATEGORY    ACCESSORIES    81

Trail adventure bundle Rave GLS • Rave RE
All you need for the ultimate long distance trail adventures. No matter the elements 
or riding conditions, with these essentials you are ready to beat whatever challenges 
a snowmobile adventure can offer.

your shredding time. With added ruggedness, improved visibility and maximal 
storage space, you’ll be ready to enjoy the longest of rides.

Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2024 specification page:

MEN’S
Charcoal Grey (07), Denim Blue (79), Khaki (05)
NEW MEN’S CONVERTIBLE MID-LAYER FLEECE
454808 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Semi-fitted zipped sweatshirt.
• Use everyday and as a mid layer on trails.
• 100% polyester with anti-microbial.
• Heavy weight fleece for maximum warmth.
• Removable sleeves.
• Reflective heat transferred Ski-Doo logo at left 
chest.
• 2 hand pockets.
Black (90), Bronze (92), Grey (09)
NEW MEN’S HYBRID ZIP-UP TECH FLEECE
454817 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Technical fleece for warmth and mobility. 
• Use everyday and as a mid layer on trails.
• 95% polyester, 5% spandex.
• Adjustable hood.
• 2 hand pockets with Ski-Doo branded zipper pulls.
• Reflective Ski-Doo logo at left chest and back.
Black (90), Ivory (97)
NEW MEN’S SKI-DOO VECTOR T-SHIRT
454825 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Casual T-Shirt for everyday wear.
• 100% cotton.
• Small Ski-Doo logo at front.
• Ski-Doo artwork at back.
• Ski-Doo fold up label on bottom left side.
Black (90), Green (70), Heather Grey (27)
NEW MEN’S SKI-DOO VINTAGE T-SHIRT
454826 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Casual T-Shirt for everyday wear.
• 100% cotton.
• Ski-Doo artwork centered at front.
•  Ski-Doo fold up label on bottom left side.
Charcoal Grey (07), Denim Blue (79), Ivory (97)
NEW MEN’S WAFFLE KNIT THERMAL LONG 
SLEEVE HENLEY
454827 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL
• Casual fit waffle knit long sleeve t-shirt.
• 60% cotton, 40% polyester.
• Ski-Doo patch on left chest.
• Small Ski-Doo logo at back neck.
• Ski-Doo fold up label on bottom left side.
Black (90), Green (70), Orange (12), Wine (32)
NEW MEN’S PUFFER WELDED JACKET
454829 •S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Mid layer welded jacket perfect to wear under a 
shell. 
• Use everyday and for deep snow riding.
• 100% polyester.
• Insulation: 90% duck down, 10% feather.
• Chest pocket with Ski-Doo branded zipper pull.
• Reflective Ski-Doo logo at left chest.
• Fleece lined pockets.
• Heat transferred Ski-Doo logo on inner front flap.
Black (90), Heather Charcoal (29), Indigo Blue (82)
MEN’S PORTAL PULLOVER HOODIE
454752 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Comfortable Pullover hoodie of Premium quality.
• 60% cotton, 40% polyester.
• One side brushed fleece.
• Handwarmer kangaroo pocket.
• Artwork graphic at center front chest.
Black (90), Green (70), Navy (89)
NEW MEN’S PLAID FLANNEL SHIRT
454803 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Comfortable Plaid Flannel shirt. 
• 100% cotton
• 4-hole plastic Ski-Doo engraved button. 
• Chest pocket with small Ski-Doo patch.
• Ski-Doo embroidery at back.
Bronze (92), Green (70)
NEW MEN’S PLAID OVERSHIRT
454806 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Warm and rigid plaid overshirt. 
• 100% cotton
• Entirely fleece lined for additional warmth.
• Front opening with Ski-Doo branded press buttons.
• 2 Chest pockets with small Ski-Doo patch on left 
one.
• Ski-Doo embroidery at back.
180  APPAREL  SPORTSWEAR

140  PROTECTIVE GEAR  FOOTWEAR
TEC+ ULTRA BOOTS
444258 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
•  Tec + Ultra Boots with Tough 
abrasion resistant outer material 
and performant liner.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Tough abrasion resistant 
leather outer and textile.
•  Sympatex breathable 
waterproof membrane.
•  Performance liner that will provide warmth 
and added comfort by shaping to your foot.
•  Limit of comfort temperature range: 
*TBD*-40°F to -58°F or -40°C to -50°C*.
•  Rugged ultra-grip outsole design.
•  Removable/inner liner.
Black (90)
NEW
TEC+ BOOTS
444253 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
•  Tec + Boots with moisture-
wicking inner liner material.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Improved comfort and ﬂex 
•  Removable insole.
•  Unisex, smaller sizes added for ladies.
•  Kevlar reinforced laces.
•  600 g PrimaLoft ECO FOOTWEAR 
insulation for maximum comfort.
•  Leather outer layer incorporates 
HydroGuard† waterproof membrane.
•  Tapered rear shape for better 
achilles and ankle support.
•  Abrasion and impact resistant 
ice breaker toe piece.
•  Aggressive, durable anti-slip outsole 
for running board traction.
Black (90)
TEC+ REC BOOTS
444240 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
• Tec + Rec Boots with Tough 
abrasion resistant leather outer.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Tough abrasion resistant leather outer.
•  Breathable waterproof membrane.
•  Limit of comfort temperature range: 
-40°F to -58°F or -40°C to -50°C*.
•  Rugged ultra-grip outsole design.
•  Removable/inner liner.
Black (90)
LYNX JUNIOR BOOTS
667111 • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6
DESCRIPTION:
Warm boots for kids and juniors 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Unisex boots
•  Waterproof
•  Rubber outline
•  6mm thick removable liner
•  Height: 12” (30.5 cm)
•  Comfort-rated to -61°F (-52 °C)
Black (90)

444241 • 6, 7, 8, 9, 10

158!!PROTECTIVE GEAR!!GOGGLES
RADIEN 2.0 GOGGLES
669162 • onesize
DESCRIPTION:
Interchangeable lens technology gives you the option to change 
lenses out on your goggles. Having the option to easily swap lenses if 
the weather takes a turn means the option to customize your goggle 
for the most optimal visual experience! 
Innovative magnetic quick-change lens system with 8 connection 
points. Anti-fog and anti-smudge coating and wide ﬁeld of view, both 
horizontal and vertical. All radien lenses are UVA/UVB protected
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
Double cylindrical mirror or grey lens placed 
in a nano-frame. Additional cylindrical clear 
lens for low light conditions and goggle 
pouch included in the package. 
Lynx cypher Graphic design on the strap 
One piece lens concept: noseguard 
integrated to the lens 
Innovative magnetic quickchange lens system 
8 connection points, 16 magnets (placed in frame and lens) 
• Wide ﬁeld of view, both horizontal and vertical 
• Anti-fog and anti-smudge coating
Black (90), Charcoal Grey (07), 
Pink (36), Red (30)

FRONT BUMPER LED WORKING 
LIGHTS
REV Gen4 (Wide) except Tundra and Skandic
860201771
•	 Adjustable work lights.

(860201982, 860201983, 860201984)

REV Gen4
860202380

as needed.

and 24” and 12V outlet (860202069) for REV Gen4 (Narrow) 
16”.

REV Gen5
REV Gen4
REV-XM, XS, XP, XR, XU Tundra

E LinQ
REV Gen5 (except 600 EFI)
REV Gen4 (except Summit, Freeride and 600 EFI)
860202354
860201719
860202354
860201719
•	 Combines both DESS cord and heated visor/accessory cord 
into one.

•	 Easy and quick magnetic connection that self locates. 
•	 Reduces chances of a broken connector.
•	 Increases freedom of movement with fewer cords.

REV Gen5
860202827

NEW EMBEDDED MAPS
REV Gen5 2023 and up with 10.25” Color Touchscreen Display.
860202727
•	 Retrofit for 2023 and 2024 vehicles with a 10.25” Color 
Touchscreen Display.
•	 Adds GPS tracking.

Touchscreen Display.

TEC H N O LO GY  W ITH  A N  E D G E
DYNAMIC BREATHABILITY WITH SYMPATEX®
In contrast to other membrane technologies, the poreless compact Sympatex membrane is based on a physical and 
chemical principle. The water-attracting (hydophilic) part of the membrane absorbs the moisture from the body and emits it 
to the outside by evaporation. The water vapor molecules are transported outwards along the hydrophilic molecular chains. 
The molecular structure (hydrophilic components) of the Sympatex membrane swells with moisture and therefore provides 
space for water transport and fast evaporation.
100% WATERPROOF
100% WINDPROOF
OPTIMALLY BREATHABLE
DURABLE
CO2 NEUTRAL
PTFE-FREE
RECYCLABLE AND RECYCLED
/  
/
3  L AYE R S 
Full mobility and freedom of movement are a given with our 
Sympatex membrane. With a 3D optimized fit and coupled with 
our 3-layer lightweight stretch, it delivers comfort at every turn.

XPS Lubricants and  
Care products are expertly 
engineered to extend the 
life of your ride. 
We pair the best engineers with the 
best chemists to create products that 
exceed tomorrow's technology with 
the knowledge from an insiders 
standpoint. 
No Shortcuts
Tested on all engine platforms and  
all materials used in manufacturing 
today's powersports vehicles - not 
just one or two. We benchmarked 
against the best in every category to 
ensure XPS products meet or exceed  
each before offering them to you. 
They perform and protect  
in the harshest conditions.
From desert heat to saltwater  
corrosion to the coldest 
temperatures on earth - XPS 
products have been proven to 
protect and perform.

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this LYNX 2026 specification page:

80  ACCESSORIES  ERGONOMICS
ERGONOMICS
PERFORMANCE SMALL DIAMETER 
HANDLEBAR
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X
860202838
• Narrow design used for more agile precise maneuvers found in mountain 
applications or in trail applications ideal for smaller hand grip.
• Smaller diameter providers a lighter, easier grip.
• 20 mm grip, 22 mm clamper diameter at riser.
• Less hand fatigue.
• Grips included.
• Stock feature in all MY26 Lynx models
FIXED TOE-HOLD
Radien² Rave & Xterrain / 
Radien (Deep Snow)
860202066
• Fixed toe-holds for control and leverage when 
boondocking.
• Fits for 3500 lenght tunnel and longer.
ADJUSTABLE TOE-HOLDS
Radien² (Deep snow)
860201717
• Die-cast aluminum part.
• Allows user to adjust toe-hold position for different riding 
styles and control.
• Foldable to ease floorboard access.
• Adjustable 7.6 cm rearward and 3.8 cm upward.
• Forward/backward and top/down adjustments.
SIDE SUPPORT FOOT KIT
Radien² / Radien
860201876
• Cast aluminum outer support for riders that use their feet to 
push in corners, or desire a more locked feel.
ADJUSTABLE BRAKE LEVER
Radien² / Radien & Radien-X Xterrain
860202222
• Toolless design adjusts easily .
• Shape and size is optimized for 1 or 2 fingers.
• Total adjustment range of 20 mm.
• Up to 15.5 mm closer or 4.5mm farther away vs. standard lever.
• Stock on Radien² Shredder RE & DS and all Radien² RE models.

56  ACCESSORIES  WIND PROTECTION & MIRRORS
WIND PROTECTION & MIRRORS
NEW
ADJUSTABLE WINDSHIELD - MEDIUM 
TO HIGH
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202615
• Adjustable range of 17” (44 cm) to 21” (54 cm).
• Lever allows quick changes to amount of wind protection. 
• Compatible with Glove Box Extension (860202436).
• Includes Windshield Support (517307974).
• Side Deflectors (860202437) and adapters (860202784) required for installation.
NEW
MEDIUM WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202471
• Medium height - 17” (43 cm) in length. 
• Offers additionnal wind protection with integrated style. 
• Injection molded for clarity. 
• Compatible with Windshield-Mount Mirrors. 
• Complete kit includes windshield, side deflectors, windshield support & hardware.
• Side Deflectors (860202437) included.
• Side Deflector adapters (860202784) required for installation.
NEW
LOW WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202470
• Low height - 14” (36 cm) in length. 
• Offers additionnal wind protection with integrated style. 
• Injection molded for clarity. 
• Includes windshield support.
NEW
ULTRA HIGH WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202435
• 25” (64 cm) in length. 
• Additional wind protection with integrated style. 
• Compatible with Windshield-Mount Mirrors (860202679).
• Include Windshield Support.
• Side Deflectors (860202437) and adapters (860202784) required for installation.
NEW
ULTRA LOW WINDSHIELD
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202624
• Ultra low height - 8” (22 cm) in length. 
• Additional wind protection with integrated style. 
• Injection molded for clarity. 
• Includes windshield support.
NEW
XL HANDGUARD KIT
Radien², Radien, Radien-X
860202783
• Provides additional wind protection for the rider’s hands 
while allowing good vision on the trail. 
• The complete kit features clear, larger deflectors, black/grey colored interchangeable caps, 
and holding arm. 
•Stylish design. 
•Compatible with Pivoting Mirror Kit For Handguards (860200893). 
•Sold in pairs. 
•Does not fit with Medium to Ultra High Windshields with side deflectors (fixed or adjustable).

Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2024 specification page:

WHEEL S & SLIDER SHOES
SKI-DOO BY 
 CARBIDES
*Protected under patent numbers US 7,413,198, US 7,389.995 and CA2535565. ‡While supplies last.
Note: The use of aggressive skis, ski carbide runners or studs will alter the handling of your snowmobile, particularly in terms of maneuverability, acceleration and braking. 
Please refer to your Operators Guide for more details.
CARBIDE RUNNER
Pilot skis, except DS and DS-2 
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 skis
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 skis
860202557 • Preformed 4” 60°
860202558 • Preformed 6” 60°
860202559 • Preformed 8” 60°
• The Dooly† by Woodys has two 7⁄16” Flat-Top† runners 
mounted on a plate for each ski.
• Four contact lines on snow surface help decrease  
darting of sled as it makes own groove in a trail.
• When in a turn, only one of the Dooly bars is in contact  
with the snow or ice.
• A Dooly with 4”, 6” or 8” of carbide on both runners 
provides the same turning power as a single runner  
with 4”, 6” or 8” of turning carbide.
• Sold individually.
ACE SKI RUNNER
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 skis
860201969 • Preformed 6” 60°
860201970 • Preformed 8” 60°
• Woodys ACE single runner line uses a 3⁄8” x 1⁄2”  
preformed steel square bar.
• Taller profile and more aggressive, providing  
excellent control in all conditions.
• Works great in deep snow.
• Carries innovative features like 60° carbide inserts that  
are guaranteed not to come out under any conditions, 
Flat-Top design, rounded wear pads, full-length hardweld 
and bevel-cut host bar that doesn’t snag trailer edge.
• Pack of 2.
EXECUTIVE† CARBIDES
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 skis
860200580
• 1⁄2” round preformed material swedged at each end to best 
fit ski contour fitted with 8” of 60° turning carbide.
• Performance trail riders are known to use this runner.
• Provides proper balance with a studded track.
• Pack of 2.
EXTENDER TRAIL III† CARBIDES
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 skis
860200578
• 1⁄2” round preformed material swedged at each end to best 
fit ski contour.
• 4” of 60° turning carbide provides positive cornering 
control.
• Pack of 2.
TRAIL BLAZER IV† CARBIDES 
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 skis
860200579
• 1⁄2” round preformed material swedged at each end to best 
fit ski contour.
• With 6” of 60° turning carbide, this runner is designed for 
trail riders looking for performance in cornering power and 
control.
• Pack of 2.
SLIDER WITH VESPEL† INSERTS
All models with 163” and longer tunnels
All models with 154” and shorter tunnels
503194816
503194815
• Uses DuPont Vespel inserts for less friction.
• Can be cut to desired length.
• Better fuel efficiency, more power and increased vehicle 
speed due to reduced friction between the track clips  
and slides.
• Reduced need for maintenance and associated costs.
• Extended life due to enhanced wear characteristics of 
Vespel polyamide over incumbent UHMW PE.
• Allows riders to operate sleds in less than acceptable 
snow and trail conditions since water from snow is not 
needed for lubricity as with incumbent UHMW PE slide rails.
MAVERICK CARBIDES
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 Skis
860202677 • 6”
860202678 • 8” 
• Classic Woody’s hardweld to help reduce wear on the bar.
• Woody’s precision 60 degree Carbide inserts.
• Lighter — weight savings over traditionally shaped bars.
• Concave sides to help hold snow and improve turning.
• This bar is CNC wireformed to insure a perfect fit.
• Will offer better control at increased speeds.
NEW NAVIGATOR SKI PROTECTORS
Pilot X skis
860202720
• Protect skis from wear at the front.
• Reduces darting as plate packs grooves, leaving runners 
a fresh path.
• Compatible with any single runner made.
• Compatible with Woody’s Dooly runners. 
• Sold in pairs.
110
106  PARTS  CATEGORY
106  PARTS  TRACTION & CONTROL

860201025*

860200732*

(860200395).

REV-XU Skandic and Expedition
860201063

DESCRIPTION:
•  Introducing the new ultra warm Lynx Tec Layer 
Heavyweight Down Packable Jacket.
•  Functional, warm outer layer for breaks while 
snowmobiling and regular winter use.
•  Can also be used as a very warm mid-layer on long, subzero journeys.

•  Insulation: Primaloft® 
down blend Gold.
•  Packable design is great for 
on-the-go and travel!

in pockets.
•  Microﬂeece and Spandex 
at underarm vents.

with high compression.
•  Sold with a stowable bag.

with laminated brim and

at front opening

zippers at pockets.

and toggle on both sides.

• Warmest jacket in our collection.

46  ACCESSORIES  STORAGE
CELLPHONE HOLDER
Radien² / Radien
860202372
• Design is independent of the 
Glove Box Extension door. 
• Water resistant door allows 
for perfect phone positioning. 
• Heating element preserves 
cell phone battery longer. 
• Features capacitive and 
resistive touch screen 
technology.  
• Spring system in back plate 
automatically adjusts for 
thickness. 
• USB Intelligent Power Outlet 
is included for charging. 
• Fits all cellphones within 
170 mm x 85 mm x 15 mm 
dimensions.  
• Works with almost all charger 
wires. 
• Does not include cell phone. 
• Can be used with or without 
windshield. 
• Requires Glovebox Extension 
(860202436, 860202596 or 
860201523) depending on the 
vehicle. 
• Requires Harness 
(515178153) for installation 
on Radien models.
CELL PHONE HOLDER
Radien / Radien-X
860202072
• Doubles the storage with additional 3,5 liter capacity.  
• Can be used with or without windshield.  
• Cell phone heater included.  
• Does not include cell phone.  
• Available also the replacement door for glovebox, 860202169, sold separately.
GLOVEBOX REPLACEMENT DOOR / 
CELL PHONE HOLDER
Fits with Glovebox Extension (860201523)
860202169
• Replacement door to update Glovebox Extension with a cell phone holder. 
• Door allows for perfect positioning and mounting of a cell phone. 
• Cell phone heater included. 
• Requires 12V Outlet Plug (860201261). 
• For screen size up to 6.4” (16.26 cm) x 3.3” (8.38 cm). 
• Works with capacitive and resistive touch screen technology.

Radien² Deep Snow
860202596

Radien / Radien-X
860201270

Radien
860201691

• USB Intelligent Power Outlet 
is included for charging. 
• Fits all cellphones within 
170 mm x 85 mm x 15 mm 
dimensions.  
• Works with almost all charger 
wires. 
• Does not include cell phone. 
• Can be used with or without 
windshield. 
• Requires Glovebox Extension 
(860202436, 860202596 or 
860201523) depending on the 
vehicle. 
• Requires Harness 
(515178153) for installation 
on Radien models.
CELL PHONE HOLDER
Radien / Radien-X
860202072
• Doubles the storage with additional 3,5 liter capacity.  
• Can be used with or without windshield.  
• Cell phone heater included.  
• Does not include cell phone.  
• Available also the replacement door for glovebox, 860202169, sold separately.
GLOVEBOX REPLACEMENT DOOR / 
CELL PHONE HOLDER
Fits with Glovebox Extension (860201523)
860202169
• Replacement door to update Glovebox Extension with a cell phone holder. 
• Door allows for perfect positioning and mounting of a cell phone. 
• Cell phone heater included. 
• Requires 12V Outlet Plug (860201261). 
• For screen size up to 6.4” (16.26 cm) x 3.3” (8.38 cm). 
• Works with capacitive and resistive touch screen technology.
GLOVEBOX EXTENSION
Radien² Deep Snow
860202596
• Increases storage by an additional 6-liter capacity. 
• Door allows for perfect positionning and mounting of Cellphone holder (860202372) 
• Replaces stock strorage compartment cover.  
• Cellphone holder sold separately.
GLOVEBOX EXTENSION
Radien / Radien-X
860201523
• Doubles the storage with additionall 4-liter capacity.  
• Can be used with or without windshield.  
• Door allows for perfect postioning and mounting of GPS.  
• GPS sold separately.
GLOVEBOX LINER
Radien / Radien-X
860201270
• Thermoformed liner has a soft finish interior. 
• Features one pocket to separate items.
GOGGLE BAG
Radien
860201691
• Designed specifically for a spare set of goggles. 
• Under hood heat clears and dries wet fogged goggles. 
• Protects goggles during the ride.

with heels and back against a wall.

140  PROTECTIVE GEAR  FOOTWEAR
TEC+ ULTRA BOOTS
444258 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
•  Tec + Ultra Boots with Tough 
abrasion resistant outer material 
and performant liner.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Tough abrasion resistant 
leather outer and textile.
•  Sympatex breathable 
waterproof membrane.
•  Performance liner that will provide warmth 
and added comfort by shaping to your foot.
•  Limit of comfort temperature range: 
*TBD*-40°F to -58°F or -40°C to -50°C*.
•  Rugged ultra-grip outsole design.
•  Removable/inner liner.
Black (90)
NEW
TEC+ BOOTS
444253 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
•  Tec + Boots with moisture-
wicking inner liner material.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Improved comfort and ﬂex 
•  Removable insole.
•  Unisex, smaller sizes added for ladies.
•  Kevlar reinforced laces.
•  600 g PrimaLoft ECO FOOTWEAR 
insulation for maximum comfort.
•  Leather outer layer incorporates 
HydroGuard† waterproof membrane.
•  Tapered rear shape for better 
achilles and ankle support.
•  Abrasion and impact resistant 
ice breaker toe piece.
•  Aggressive, durable anti-slip outsole 
for running board traction.
Black (90)
TEC+ REC BOOTS
444240 • 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13
DESCRIPTION:
• Tec + Rec Boots with Tough 
abrasion resistant leather outer.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Tough abrasion resistant leather outer.
•  Breathable waterproof membrane.
•  Limit of comfort temperature range: 
-40°F to -58°F or -40°C to -50°C*.
•  Rugged ultra-grip outsole design.
•  Removable/inner liner.
Black (90)
LYNX JUNIOR BOOTS
667111 • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6

Warm boots for kids and juniors 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Unisex boots
•  Waterproof
•  Rubber outline
•  6mm thick removable liner
•  Height: 12” (30.5 cm)
•  Comfort-rated to -61°F (-52 °C)
Black (90)

444241 • 6, 7, 8, 9, 10

abrasion resistant leather outer.

• Tough abrasion resistant leather outer.

•  Limit of comfort temperature range:

120  APPAREL  RACING
RACING
Your blood pumping through the veins. 
Your heart pounding with excitement. The 
unbreakable concentration from start to 
ﬁnish. Your eye ﬁrmly on the prize: crossing 
the line and earning your place on the 
podium. It’s the winning spirit you take from 
the track to your team – and the right riding 
gear that gives you the edge.
Carry your team colors proudly! Snowmobile 
racing is more than just a passion: it requires 
tenacity, commitment, and adequate apparel. 
The Lynx Racing clothing, made out of 
high-quality materials, provides you with 
functional moisture management, warmth and 
protection every time you hit the track. Add 
a ﬁnal touch to your winning look, even in the 
days between races.
RIDE WITH YOUR TRIBE. 
AHEAD OF THE PACK.
TRAIL

138  APPAREL  HEADWEAR
LYNX KIDS BEANIE
665330 • onesize
DESCRIPTION:
Lifestyle hat for kids with Pom-Pom and 
woven Lynx logo. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
Knitted hat with micro ﬂeece lining.
Blue (80), Orange (12)
NEW
LYNX LANDING HAT
665309 • onesize
DESCRIPTION:
• Lifestyle hat with the Lynx logo.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 95% Acrylic, 4% Nylon, 1% Spandex.
•  Foldover cuﬀ.
Black (90), Fire Red (06), Heather Grey (27), Teal (74)
NEW
HEADWEAR
LYNX X SVALA TUNDRA BALACLAVA
665302 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL
DESCRIPTION:
The most protective hood in Windproof hood 
range, which allows you to get active even in 
the coldest conditions. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
- Coolmax fabric on top of head breathes and 
transports moisture. 
- Wind and waterproof double layer special 
knit with warm ﬂeece on the inside, neck and 
throat. 
- Longer collar part protects neck/chin well. 
- All seams are ﬂat sewn for 
comfortable to wear.
Black (90)
LYNX X SVALA RACE BALACLAVA
665303 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL
DESCRIPTION:
This shaped wind-protective helmet hood is 
ideal for racing and active riding. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
- Hood is windproof and breathable. 
- Coolmax fabric breathes and transfers 
moisture away from the skin.  
- Keeps its shape perfectly 
- All seams are ﬂat sewn for the comfort.
Black (90)
LYNX X SVALA HYBRID BALACLAVA
665304 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL
DESCRIPTION:
Highly versatile Balaclava, that is ideal for 
winter use and variety of conditions and 
functions. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
- Hinged hood eﬀectively protects the face 
from the cold. 
-Hood can be easily pull down out of the way, 
the head area folded back or pulled under 
the chin. 
- The seam placement has been reﬁned 
- Constructed with comibination of 
materials all in the name of comfort.
Black (90)
LYNX X SVALA BASE BALACLAVA
665305 • 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL
DESCRIPTION:
This shaped wind-protective helmet hood 
is ideal for snowmobiling, whenever you’re 
going. The forehead, ears, chin, neck and 
neck are all protected with our special 
windproof fabric that is both breathable and 
moisture-wicking. Coolmax fabric is used 
around the head and forehead to allow the 
skin to breath and wick moisture away. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
- Longer collar part protects neck/chin well. 
- The balaclava keeps its shape and sits 
ﬁrmly in place without slipping down.
Black (90)

149!!PROTECTIVE GEAR!!HELMETS
OXYGEN CARBON HELMET !DOT)
OXYGEN CARBON HELMET 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• Adjustable humidity extractor vents.
•  Unobstructed panoramic ﬁeld 
of vision for an incredible mask-
less riding experience.
•  Large neck skirt with vent.
•  Rear removeable curtain
•  Unique remote control with 
visor heat indicators.
•  1750 g ± for size large.
OXYGEN FLOW CARBON 
HELMET !DOT)
OXYGEN FLOW CARBON HELMET 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Visor equipped with an adjustable 
ventilation system to adjust the 
temperature inside the helmet 
according to the weather conditions. 
Our tests have shown a temperature 
reduction up to 10°C compared 
to the visor without a vent.
•  Large neck skirt with vent.
•  Rear removeable curtain
•  1750 g ± for size large.
Black (90)
OXYGEN FLOW HELMET !DOT)
OXYGEN FLOW HELMET 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Visor equipped with an adjustable 
ventilation system to adjust the 
temperature inside the helmet 
according to the weather conditions. 
Our tests have shown a temperature 
reduction up to 10°C compared 
to the visor without a vent.
•  Includes a rear removable 
curtain and a vent in the chin 
curtain for extra airﬂow
•  Neck skirt to reduce air intrusion.
•  1850 g ± for size large.
NEW White (01), Black (90), Matte Black (93) 
OXYGEN HELMET – COMMON FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  4-year limited warranty.
• Lightweight M-FORGE® Composite shell
•  Adjustable humidity extractor vents.
•  Unobstructed panoramic ﬁeld 
of vision for an incredible mask-
less riding experience.

pivot contact system.

scratch coatings.

opening adjustments for airﬂow.

light for added rider safety.

best vision in snow conditions.
•  Ready to receive the 
communication system.
•  Operate all features with gloved hands.
•  2 shell sizes for better ﬁt and comfort.
•  Ratcheting quick-release chin strap.
•  Recyclable helmet shell for 
minimal environmental impact.
•  Aerodynamic shape to 
reduce neck fatigue.
•  D.O.T. certiﬁed

For advertising purposes, some scenes depicted in this brochure include professional riders and racers executing maneuvers or performances under ideal and/or controlled conditions. Do not attempt any of these or any other 
risky maneuvers if they’re beyond your level of riding ability, as well as your understanding and respect for the performance of your snowmobile. Always ride responsibly and safely. Always observe applicable local laws and 
regulations. Always wear the appropriate protective clothing, including a helmet. And remember, if you’re going to drink, please don’t ride. Because of its ongoing commitment to product quality and innovation, Bombardier 
Recreational Products Inc. (BRP) reserves the right, at any time, to discontinue or change speciﬁcations, prices, designs, features, models or equipment without incurring any obligation. Some models depicted herein may include 
optional equipment. Prices are based on Manufacturer Suggested Retail Prices. Dealer may sell for a different price. Taxes are not included. BRP is a proud member of the SSCC (Snowmobiling Safety Certiﬁcation Committee), 
Machine Safety Standard, Operator Safety Training, Safe Trails, ISMA (International Snowmobile Manufacturers Association), National Snowmobile Foundation and Tread Lightly! Inc. By being a member of these important 
snowmobiling associations, we recognize and support their efforts in sharing the responsibility in promoting the growth of our sport. Isolﬁl is a registered trademark of Yarns and Threads For Textile. mcFIT is a registered 
trademark of MCTECH Corporation. PrimaLoft Gold, PrimaLoft Silver and PrimaLoft Black are registered trademarks of Albany International Corp. Sympatex is a registered trademark of Sympatex Technologies GmbH. Dri-Lex is 
a registered trademark of Faytex Corp. Vespel, Teﬂon HT and Kevlar are trademarks of E.I. DuPont de Nemours & Co. Thermolite and Cordura are registered trademarks of INVISTA for durable fabrics. Thermocool is a registered 
trademark of ADVANSA. Velcro is a registered trademark of Velcro Industries. Scott is a trademark of Scott Sports SA. M-FORGE® Composite is a patented and registered trademark of MAT GROUP™. TekVest is a registered 
trademark of Tekrider. Fidlock is a registered trademark of Fidlock GmbH. Terra is a trademark of Superwinch LLC. Bluetooth is a registered trademark of Bluetooth SIG, Inc. Warn is a registered trademark of Warn Industries Inc. 
GTX is a trademark of Castrol Limited used under license. Montana and Zumo are registered trademarks of Garmin Ltd. NGK is a registered trademark of NGK Spark Plugs, Ltd. Extender Trail III, Trail Blazer IV, Executive, Flat-top 
and Dooly are trademarks and registered trademarks of Woody’s International Engineering and Manufacturing, Inc. RipSaw, RipSaw Lite, ICE Ripper, ICE Ripper XT, ICE Attak and Powder Max are trademarks of Camoplast Inc. 
Lexan is a registered trademark of SABIC Innovative Plastics. Superclamp II is a trademark of Bowdriks Industries. FOX is a registered trademark of Fox Racing Canada, Kolpin and Impact are registered trademarks of Kolpin 
Powersports Inc. Yuasa is a registered trademark of YUASA Batteries Inc. Schumacher® and the Schumacher logo are registered trademarks of Schumacher Electric Corporation. Depending on location, products are distributed 
by BRP US Inc., Bombardier Recreational Products Inc., BRP European Distribution SA, BRP Finland Oy., BRP Australia Pty Ltd. or Bombardier Recreational, Products Motores da Amazonia Ltda. In the U.S.A., products are 
distributed by BRP US Inc. In Canada, products are distributed by Bombardier Recreational Products Inc. ®/TM and the BRP logo are registered trademarks of Bombardier Recreational Products Inc. or its afﬁliates. All other 
company and/or product names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. © 2025 BRP. All rights reserved. Printed in European Union.

Recreational Products Inc. (BRP) reserves the right, at any time, to discontinue or change speciﬁcations, prices, designs, features, models or equipment without incurring any obligation. Some models depicted herein may include 
optional equipment. Prices are based on Manufacturer Suggested Retail Prices. Dealer may sell for a different price. Taxes are not included. BRP is a proud member of the SSCC (Snowmobiling Safety Certiﬁcation Committee), 
Machine Safety Standard, Operator Safety Training, Safe Trails, ISMA (International Snowmobile Manufacturers Association), National Snowmobile Foundation and Tread Lightly! Inc. By being a member of these important 
snowmobiling associations, we recognize and support their efforts in sharing the responsibility in promoting the growth of our sport. Isolﬁl is a registered trademark of Yarns and Threads For Textile. mcFIT is a registered

67  ACCESSORIES  SKID PLATES, PROTECTORS & REINFORCEMENT
RAIL REINFORCEMENT
Radien² (except deep snow) 
Radien
860201870 • PPS² rear suspension 
860202462 • PPS³ rear suspension
• Fits all Radien and Radien² models with PPS² or PPS³ rear suspension.
SNOWFLAP EXTENSION
Radien²
860202567
• Removable snowflap extension that helps engine cooling in 
hardpack, low & icy snow conditions when installed. 
• Stows on the tunnel when not in use. 
• Installs on the stock lightweight snowflap of Shredder models with short tunnel. 
• Compatible with stock and hitch bumpers.
• Light or heavy-duty Rear bumper required.
LinQ REMOVABLE SNOWFLAP
Radien
860201515
• Innovative way to remove snowflap. 
• Can be installed with stock flap. 
• Stows on the tunnel when not in use. 
• Does not fit on Boondocker RE & DS and Xterrain RE (2022 and up).
BRAKE RESERVOIR PROTECTOR
Radien² / Radien 
(only models with standard 
controls on handlebar)
860202171
• Increases impact protection for the brake reservoir. 
• Window to see fluid level. 
• Cast aluminum construction. 
• Stock on 2022 BoonDocker RE & DS models and 2023-2024 Shredder RE & DS models.

Inverse correlation with helmets!

Ventilated helmet = Warmer balaclava
FABRIC
Lignt
Medium
Heavy
Mesh
Light Balaclava
Ultimate Warmth Balaclava
Breath Guard Mid Balaclava
BALACLAVA
CREATING AN ECOSYSTEM WITH HELMETS
Black (90)
NEW LIGHT BALACLAVA
448796 • S/M, L/XL
•	 Light Balaclava provides optimal breathability.
•	 Perfect when used with the OXYGEN helmets or any 
full-face helmet model.
•	 88% recycled polyester/12% spandex.
•	 Wicking properties.
•	 Snag-resistant.
•	 Back-brushed material. 
•	 Stretch-bonding finish all around the face for extra 
comfort.
•	 Long lightweight front neck curtain to protect from 
wind.
•	 Shorter neck curtain at back to avoid bulkiness in 
jacket.
•	 Improved fit stays well in place when riding.
•	 Head opening under the chin.
•	 Offered in 2 sizes: S/M and L/XL.
•	 Ski‑Doo logo at chin.
Black (90)

448797 • S/M, L/XL

breathability and windproofness.

breath guard featuring helmet models.

comfort.

from air entry.

jacket.

SKI‑DOO BY 
 CARBIDES
RUNNER COMPAR ATIVE GUIDE
MAVERICK
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pi139.99
860202677 – 6”
860202678 – 8”
Performance

Ease of Steering

Longevity

•	 Aggressive, hourglass profile host bar that digs deep and turns hard in a wide 
variety of conditions. 
•	 Available in 6-8” of cutting carbides to accommodate un-studded to heavily 
studded sleds. 
•	 Hardweld is also added in the high wear areas to prolong runners’ life.
•	 Sold in pairs.
5/8
1/2
60°
123/4
63/8
DOOLY
Pilot Skis except Pilot 5.7 SL
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 Skis
860202557 – 4”
860202558 – 6”
860202559 – 8”
Performance

Ease of Steering

Longevity

•	 This dual carbide runner has two single runners mounted to a steel plate, 
producing a total of four contact lines on the terrain. 
•	 These four blades with 60° carbide drastically reduce darting as they carve 
through existing grooves from single runners. 
•	 This design spreads the PSI across two points, which extends the life of the 
runner and eases steering. 
•	 When turning, only one blade per dual runner will contact the terrain, acting like 
a pair of single runners. 
•	 Available with 4”, 6”, and 8” carbide per blade; exceptions exist for runners with 
short lengths. 
•	 Sold individually.
11/2
5/8
60°
60°
63/8
121/2
SLIM JIM 2.0 DOOLY
Pilot Skis except Pilot 5.7 SL
NEW 860202776 – 4”
NEW 860202923 – 6”

Performance

Ease of Steering

Longevity

•	 Aggressive dual runner design that eliminates darting and penetrates deep for 
maximum cornering ability. 
•	 Available in 4” and 6” of cutting carbide per host bar to accommodate un-
studded to heavily studded snowmobiles. 
•	 Hardweld is also added in high wear areas to prolong runner life.
•	 Sold individually.
3/4
60°
60°
11/2
ACE
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 Skis
860201969 – 6”
860201970 – 8”
Performance

Ease of Steering

Longevity

•	 These carbide runners are the tallest in the industry and have a narrow, 
rectangular profile for aggressive turning capabilities. 
•	 The 60° turning carbides, available in 6” and 8”, have been strategically placed to 
protect the runner and reduce darting by carving through existing grooves. 
•	 Work great on Crossovers and in deep snow.
•	 Steel bars from excessive wear.
•	 Sold in pairs.
3/8
5/8
60°
123/4
63/8
EXECUTIVE
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot 7.4, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 Skis
860200580 – 8”
Performance

Ease of Steering

Longevity

•	 These single runners provide balanced traction for performance-based trail and 
cross country riders with studded tracks.
•	 The 8” of 60° turning carbides are strategically placed under the ½” host bar to 
provide superior traction and protect the steel bars from excessive wear.
•	 Sold in pairs.
1/2
9/16
60°

EXTENDER TRAIL III
Pilot X, Pilot 5.7 SL, Pilot 5.7, Pilot DS, Pilot DS-2, Pilot DS-3 Skis
860200578 – 4”
Performance

Ease of Steering

Longevity

•	 Woody’s entry level carbide runners featuring 4” of 60° carbides and a 7/16” host 
bar. 
•	 Whether you’re looking for replacement factory runners, a cutting edge in hard-
packed snow and ice, or to improve your safety and handling, this option is for 
you. 
•	 For use on snowmobiles with un-studded to lightly studded tracks.
•	 Sold in pairs.

Longevity

•	 These runners have 6” of 60° turning carbides beneath their ½” host bar – a great 
choice if you are looking for overall improvement in safety and handling, or to 
replace your factory runners.

NAVIGATOR SKI PROTECTORS
Pilot X Skis
860202720
•	 Protect skis from wear at the front.
•	 Reduces darting as plate packs grooves, leaving runners a fresh path.
•	 Compatible with any single runner made.
•	 Compatible with Woody’s Dooly runners.

Performance: The cornering ability of the runner ( 1 = Limited Ability 4 = Maximum Ability) 
Ease of Steering: How easy it is to turn the handle bars (1 = More Effort 4 = Less Effort) 
Longevity: Lifespan in comparison to a standard steel runner (no carbide or hardweld)

Performance: The cornering ability of the runner ( 1 = Limited Ability 4 = Maximum Ability) 
Ease of Steering: How easy it is to turn the handle bars (1 = More Effort 4 = Less Effort) 
Longevity: Lifespan in comparison to a standard steel runner (no carbide or hardweld)

860202459

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2026 specification page:

ROTAX® ENGINES
Experience the advantage of XPS. Oil and care products engineered to extend the life of your ride, tested in the world’s  
harshest conditions, and designed to optimize your vehicle’s performance. Learn more at XPSlubricants.com.
1 Observed metric horsepower based on internal dyno test performed in optimal conditions. 
2 Data based on internal engineering trail testing.
3 Data based on internal engineering trail testing in ECO mode.
4 Based on retail sale results as of December 31, 2019.
ROTAX 2-STROKE ENGINES
Heart-thumping power, lightweight  
design, proven reliability – E-TEC® 
direct-injection engine technology  
delivers the most sought-after attributes  
in the snowmobile industry.
Our lineup of 2-stroke engines now includes 
the brand-new 600 EFI (Electronic Fuel 
Injection) engine. Reliable, affordable  
and easy to use, it’s an entry-level engine 
that far exceeds what you thought  
an entry-level engine had to be.
With the E-TEC engine lineup, you also get:
•	Industry-leading fuel economy2
•	Excellent oil economy
•	Virtually no smoke or smell
•	Light, linear throttle pull
•	Automatic summerization process
850 E-TEC TURBO R
•	180 hp up to 2400 meters1
•	World’s most powerful factory-built 
2-stroke turbo
•	Water injection system for optimal intake 
air temperatures (trail models only)
850 E-TEC
•	165 horsepower1
•	Down to 12.3 L/100 km2
600R E-TEC
•	125 horsepower1
•	Down to 11.3 L/100 km2
600 EFI
• 85 horsepower1
• Down to 13.3 L/100 km2
E-TEC engines are the best-selling 
2-stroke engines in snowmobiling.4
ROTAX ACETM 4-STROKE ENGINES
With the Advanced Combustion Efficiency 
(ACE) family of engines, BRP engineers 
optimized the combustion system, 
reduced mechanical friction, and freed 
intake and exhaust breathing. The result 
is the most efficient engine in 
snowmobiling. Not only are they efficient, 
they’re a pleasure to operate and own. 
Very little maintenance is required; they 
run smoothly and produce a nice, solid 
– yet quiet – sound.
900 ACE TURBO R 
•	Rotax-designed turbocharger
•	180 horsepower1
•	Cable-activated throttle  
with reconfigured iTC
900 ACE TURBO WITH iTC
•	Rotax-designed turbocharger
•	130 horsepower1
•	Down to 12.1 L/100 km3
900 ACE WITH iTC
•	3 cylinders
•	95 horsepower1 
•	Down to 10.8 L/100 km3
600 ACE WITH iTC
•	2 cylinders
•	62 horsepower1
•	Down to 8 L/100 km – the most fuel-
efficient in the entire industry3
ACE engines are the best-selling 4-stroke 
engines in snowmobiling.4
INTELLIGENT THROTTLE CONTROL
Standard on the ACE engines, the iTC™ 
system delivers a whole different 
snowmobiling experience.
•	Driving Modes: A button on the console 
enables you to select one of three 
driving modes. Standard mode ensures 
a smooth start and linear acceleration; 
Sport enables full performance and 
quicker acceleration; ECO® limits top 
speed and acceleration rates for a more 
relaxed, fuel-conserving ride.
•	Finger Throttle: The throttle block can 
be rotated forward for use as a finger 
throttle, if preferred. Great for changing 
hand positions on a long ride and for 
more control through bumps.
VEHICLE SPECIFICATIONS    5  
ROTAX ENGINES    VEHICLE SPECIFICATIONS    5

*Pricing not available due to pricing fluctuation of oil based products.
MAINTENANCE PRODUCTS
EXTENDED LIFE PRE-MIXED COOLANT
619590728 • 1 qt / 946 ml
•	 Antifreeze/coolant contains the correct dilution and 
the necessary additives to prevent corrosion and inhibit 
cavitation in BRP cooling systems.
•	 Long-life, 5-year formula specially formulated for BRP 
vehicles.
•	 Superior heat transfer.
•	 Ideal replacement for vehicles that normally use a 2-year 
antifreeze/coolant (green).
•	 5 years (orange).
DOT 4 BRAKE FLUID
9779207 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
•	 Meets or exceeds all DOT3 and DOT4 brake fluid 
requirements.
•	 High-temperature formula resists fade, and also conditions 
seals and O-rings in braking systems.
OIL FILTER
420956124 
•	 900 ACE, 900 ACE Turbo, 600 ACE and 1203 engines.
SYNTHETIC CHAINCASE OIL
9779185 • 12 fl. oz. / 355 ml
•	 Specially developed for high-performance Ski‑Doo models, 
it represents the best in state-of-the-art chaincase 
lubrication.
•	 This multigrade full-synthetic formula flows well at cold 
temperatures and won’t break down at high temperatures.
•	 Made with additives that protect internal components 
from wear and corrosion and also conditions seals.
•	 Not for use in 2-speed snowmobile transmissions on 
Expedition, Skandic utility models.
SYNTHETIC GREASE SUSPENSION
9779226 • 14 oz./ 400 g
•	 Designed to work specifically with the components found in 
Can-Am and Ski‑Doo vehicle suspensions.
•	 It is highly stable and offers optimal lubrication at both 
extreme cold and high temperatures while protecting 
suspension components from dirt and moisture, as well as 
corrosion under extreme washout conditions.
XPS ICE INTAKE COOLING ENHANCER
9779362 • 1 US gal / 3.785 L
•	 XPS Ice is a sophisticated blend of methanol and filtered 
water. 
•	 Specially formulated to cool the air intake charge of 
engines in the water injection system.
XPS SPLINE GREASE
9779472 • 4 oz.
•	 Enhanced rust and corrosion resistance.
•	 Protects against seizure, heat-freeze, galling, rust and 
corrosion.

List all technical specifications with their values:

COVERS & TR AILERING
LIGHTWEIGHT PACKABLE COVER
REV Gen4
860202172
•	 Compact, lightweight and packable.
•	 Covers front lights, handlebar, cluster, glovebox and seat area. 
•	 Fits all REV Gen4 from 16” to 24”.
TUNNEL COVER
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (Narrow) and (Wide) 16” up to 146” length sleds
860201844
•	 Protects tunnel accessories (single stacked).
•	 Compatible with all covers (except Grand Touring Limited).
•	 Easy to install.
•	 Not compatible with LinQ Saddlebags (860202621). 
SUPERGLIDE II PRO
860201216
•	 No more ripping up the plywood on your trailer.
•	 Allows skis to glide with ease.
•	 Traction knobs incorporated for better traction.
•	 Exclusive venting, protects the deck of your trailer from 
moisture damage.
•	 Total length of 20' (6 m).
•	 Each box contains 8 pieces 8.5” x 29.5” (21.5 cm x 74.9 cm).
•	 Comes with 48 specially coated screws with grommets.
SUPERGLIDE II WIDE 
860201592
•	 Allows sled skis to glide with ease.
•	 Specifically designed traction knobs provide improved 
traction for your feet.
•	 Oval mounting channels and custom shoulder screws 
prevent warping by allowing for expansion and contraction 
that result from varying temperature.
•	 Exclusive venting, protects the deck of your trailer from 
moisture damage.
•	 Each box contains 8 pieces 13.5” x 29.5”  
(34.3 cm x 74.9 cm).
•	 Comes with 72 specially coated screws with grommets.
•	 Total length of 20' (6 m).
SUPERGLIDE EDGE RAIL TRIM
860201217 • Aluminum
•	 To secure Superglides on ramps or decks leaving an 
encapsulated finished edge.
SUPER TRACTION GRID 
860201593
•	 Super Traction Grid’s strategic grid pattern provides 
incredible grip and accommodates all snowmobile tracks, 
even with paddles or studs.
•	 Each box contains 4 pieces 8.25” x 30” (20.9 cm x 76.2 cm) 
and hardware.
SUPERCLAMP II
860200950
•	 Innovative trailer tie-down system.
•	 Silicone rubber pads to protect your skis.
•	 Front and middle handles allow easy maneuverability.
•	 Padlock compatible, becomes a theft deterrent.
•	 Tension adjustment knob—fits all snowmobiles.
•	 Comes with screw-style deck hook.

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

Turn any winter day into 
a walk in the park
IT’S COOL TO 
STAY WARM!
FRESH FITS FOR YOUNG RIDERS
Spoil the youngest members of your family with the Ski‑Doo kids’ apparel 
ahead of their next great powder adventure. Our collection relies on trusted 
designs, colors and high-quality outerwear that make this the best gear 
around for young riders. Seriously, we kid you not.
PARTICLE JACKET FOR TEENS
Set them up for success with snowmobiling with a unique 
jacket designed for teen riders. With an inner fleece liner and 
Thermal Loft insulation, this item delivers extreme warmth 
and protection on the trail. Plus, reflective striping keeps 
young riders visible—exactly the warm welcome to the sport 
they need.

SLEIGH
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X
860202381
• Independent suspension, which guarantees a smooth ride for your cargo as well. 
• 60 kg cargo capacity. 
• Compatible with LinQ accessories e.g. Cargo Box 135 liter + Cargo box 16 liter. 
• The sled has four lashing eyes so you can strap the load. 
• The new feature would be that you have to build your top box 
with the LinQ base kit as in the picture attached.
LinQ REAR DECK
Radien-X 500 mm
860202415
• Extra LinQ deck on rear tunnel allows more storage capasity. 
• Two LinQ positons on the deck, so you can stack more LinQ accessories there. 
• Hinges on the back and LinQ lock in front allows easy access under the deck. 
• Places for binding straps. 
• Can combine e.g. under the deck 5 pcs of Under Deck storage 
boxes (860202475) and 135L box on the deck. 
• Requires Luggage Rack (860202311). 
• Note max cargo capacity 58 kg.

• Compatible with LinQ accessories e.g. Cargo Box 135 liter + Cargo box 16 liter. 
• The sled has four lashing eyes so you can strap the load. 
• The new feature would be that you have to build your top box 
with the LinQ base kit as in the picture attached.
LinQ REAR DECK
Radien-X 500 mm
860202415
• Extra LinQ deck on rear tunnel allows more storage capasity. 
• Two LinQ positons on the deck, so you can stack more LinQ accessories there. 
• Hinges on the back and LinQ lock in front allows easy access under the deck. 
• Places for binding straps. 
• Can combine e.g. under the deck 5 pcs of Under Deck storage 
boxes (860202475) and 135L box on the deck. 
• Requires Luggage Rack (860202311). 
• Note max cargo capacity 58 kg.
LUGGAGE RACK
Radien-X 500 mm

860201800

TOP 
BOTTOM 
659147  
659148
2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
Worn against the skin, the moisture-wicking antibacterial mesh 
knit stores air in its loops, which means that the product has a 
heat-balancing e!ect regardless of the level of activity. This means 
that it stays cool in the heat and provides warmth in the cold. This 
garment performs superbly as a base layer during heavy exercise, 
even if temperatures drop as low as -15°C. can be worn underneath a 
thermal layer in which case it wicks moisture to the external clothing 
layer, airs and creates a warming air layer on top of your skin.

If versatility were a helmet, it would be 
the Advex. Built for the active rider, the 
helmet adapts to temperature changes 
better than the competition to perform 
at a high level in all conditions.
Performance: 

Lightweightness	 Airflow	
Warmth

DOT and ECE

KEY TECHNOLOGIES (ADVEX VS OXYGEN)
What differentiates the Advex Helmet from the Oxygen? For one, the Advex is designed for the more 
active rider. Thanks to the M-FORCE composite shell, it delivers the same incredible performance  
and protection. But where it shines is in versatility: with a superior humidity management system,  
the Advex excels in a variety of weather conditions. Plus, the Advex’s Jet-Style design means 
easier face access, guarantees an improved noise reduction system and gives an edgy look.

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2026 specification page:

To install the studs, always use the installation tools, procedures and torque specified in the instructions. Proper installation provides maximum product 
longevity and helps prevent track damage. BRP recommends that studs be installed by authorized BRP dealers and on approved pre-patterned tracks only. 
These tracks come standard on most Ski‑Doo snowmobiles. Look for this symbol on your track. Woody’s products are designed to fit and interact with each 
other. The stud nut and support plate form a complete unit. The use of aggressive skis, ski carbide runners or studs will alter the handling of your snowmobile, 
particularly in terms of maneuverability, acceleration and braking. Please refer to your Operators Guide for more details.
PHANTOM SHARP STUDS & SUPPORT PLATES BY WOODY’S  
5/16 – 1.325”
MODELS
•	 All the benefits of 286 Phantom 
Series studs.
•	 Unique track design makes it the 
only traction product available to 
maintain track warranty and track 
life.
•	 Kit complete with stud, nut and 
support plate.

metadata.text:
To install the studs, always use the installation tools, procedures and torque specified in the instructions. Proper installation provides maximum product 
longevity and helps prevent track damage. BRP recommends that studs be installed by authorized BRP dealers and on approved pre-patterned tracks only. 
These tracks come standard on most Ski‑Doo snowmobiles. Look for this symbol on your track. Woody’s products are designed to fit and interact with each 
other. The stud nut and support plate form a complete unit. The use of aggressive skis, ski carbide runners or studs will alter the handling of your snowmobile, 
particularly in terms of maneuverability, acceleration and braking. Please refer to your Operators Guide for more details.

BLOCK HEATER
Radien² /  Radien-X
860201980
• Improves starting in extreme cold temperatures.

• Installation tool reguired (520002260, sold separately).
CTEK BRP 5.0 CHARGER
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 
/ REX / REX² / XU
860200997
The CTEK Polar MXS 5.0 battery charger is the perfect solution for restoring, 
charging, and maintaining all types of lead-acid batteries. The charger is equipped 
with a cold-resistant rubber cable on both sides. The maintenance charger ensures 
the best possible performance and long service life, especially in cold conditions, 
as the charger’s AC and DC cables perform even at temperatures as low as -30°C. 
Charger Plug 515178904 not included but is available as a spare part.

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this LYNX 2026 specification page:

BRUTAL RE 500 mm 
Brutally powerful and capable crossover sled 
for bold on and off trail adventures. Brutal RE 
with 500 mm wide track gets the new Radien² 
design with stunning looks and latest technical 
innovations.
COMMANDER RE
True adventurers forge their own paths. The 
next-generation Commander combines sporty 
trail features with power of a wide-track 
snowmobile in deep snow. It’s fast. It grinds. It 
lasts. The new chief of snow is here.
SHREDDER RE & DS 
Experience a new level of agility and precision. 
Conquer the steepest slopes and deepest snow with 
confidence. From the rear part of the tunnel to the 
ski tip, the new Shredder is reimagined for ultimate 
control.
10.25’’ Touchscreen
The 10.25’’ touchscreen display now includes enhanced 
user experience with added altitude and scale.  
For more navigation features, connect your phone  
and use the free BRP GO! App.
Core package
Rich in features, moderately priced. Powerful and 
efficient Rotax engines, high-performance KYB shock 
absorbers, and powerful LED headlights are examples 
of the features designed for demanding Nordic 
conditions in the Core package.
XTERRAIN LIMITED 
Xterrain Limited is an adventurous crossover 
snowmobile designed for long-distance trail 
journeys. It offers great engine performance, comfort 
and capability to tame any trail you encounter on 
your adventure.
Thrilling power. Unfailing grip.
the ultimate deep snow snowmobile
In the Core of Lynx
Unlock new adventures
The forerunner of 
crossover snowmobiles
Adventure awaits
2026 What’s New

next-generation Commander combines sporty 
trail features with power of a wide-track 
snowmobile in deep snow. It’s fast. It grinds. It 
lasts. The new chief of snow is here.
SHREDDER RE & DS 
Experience a new level of agility and precision. 
Conquer the steepest slopes and deepest snow with 
confidence. From the rear part of the tunnel to the 
ski tip, the new Shredder is reimagined for ultimate 
control.
10.25’’ Touchscreen
The 10.25’’ touchscreen display now includes enhanced 
user experience with added altitude and scale.  
For more navigation features, connect your phone  
and use the free BRP GO! App.
Core package
Rich in features, moderately priced. Powerful and 
efficient Rotax engines, high-performance KYB shock 
absorbers, and powerful LED headlights are examples 
of the features designed for demanding Nordic 
conditions in the Core package.
XTERRAIN LIMITED 
Xterrain Limited is an adventurous crossover 
snowmobile designed for long-distance trail 
journeys. It offers great engine performance, comfort 
and capability to tame any trail you encounter on 
your adventure.
Thrilling power. Unfailing grip.
the ultimate deep snow snowmobile
In the Core of Lynx
Unlock new adventures
The forerunner of 
crossover snowmobiles
Adventure awaits
2026 What’s New

List all technical specifications with their values:

NEW COMMUNICATION  
SYSTEM VIBE BY BRP!
NEW COMMUNICATION SYSTEM BUILT TO INTEGRATE SEAMLESSLY INTO THE 
ADVEX HELMET.
An extension of the vehicle, our comm system built in partnership with Sena for BRP. It fully integrates 
into the new Advex AND you can ride worry free as the system is fueled by the eLinQ system so,  
no matter how cold it is… you can chat, listen and ride all day long in comfort. Choose to ride without 
an electric Advex? Not a problem with twice the standard comm system battery size you can ride up to 
8hr in -18C. 
124  APPAREL  TECHNOLOGY GUIDE

STACK ABLE LinQ DECK  
ACCESSORY COMPATIBILIT Y CHART
Level up and double your storage with the Stackable LinQ Deck. 
Carries up to 50 lb. (22 kg) of gear by duplicating positions 1 and 2  
of the tunnel area  14.75” (375 mm) above it. The composite 
construction uses steel, aluminum and polypropylene in a robust 
design for long life. When the secure latch system is released  
the deck is held open by a gas strut for easy access to the cargo 
below it. Depending on seat configuration, accessories can be left 
on the deck when opening.

63  ACCESSORIES  SKID PLATES, PROTECTORS & REINFORCEMENT
RAIL REINFORCEMENT
Radien² Deep Snow
860202611
• Increases rail strength and longevity.  
• Reinforcements are installed inside the rails. 
• Standard on Shredder RE models
RAIL REINFORCEMENT
Radien² (except deep snow) 
Radien
860201870 • PPS² rear suspension 
860202462 • PPS³ rear suspension
• Fits all Radien and Radien² models with PPS² or PPS³ rear suspension.
SNOWFLAP EXTENSION
Radien² Deep Snow
860202567
• Removable snowflap extension that helps engine cooling in hardpack, low & icy snow 
conditions when installed.  
• Stows on the tunnel when not in use.  
• Installs on the stock lightweight snowflap of Shredder models with short tunnel.  
• Compatible with stock and hitch bumpers. 
• Light or heavy-duty Rear bumper required.
LinQ REMOVABLE SNOWFLAP
Radien
860201515
• Innovative way to remove snowflap.  
• Can be installed with stock flap.  
• Stows on the tunnel when not in use.  
• Does not fit on Boondocker RE & DS and Xterrain RE (2022 and up).
BRAKE RESERVOIR PROTECTOR
Radien² / Radien 
(only models with standard 
controls on handlebar)
860202171
• Increases impact protection for the brake reservoir.  
• Window to see fluid level.  
• Cast aluminum construction.  
• Stock on 2022 BoonDocker RE & DS models and 2023-2024 Shredder RE & DS models. 
• Does not fit to any of 2025 models, those already have aluminium reservoir as standard.

860202904

glovebox.

•	 Requires a windshield for installation.
•	 Retrofit for vehicles with a 10.25” Touchscreen Display.

FRONT SHOCKS - FOX LIGHTWEIGHT 
FLOAT 3 EVOL QS
Radien BoonDocker DS 
Radien² Shredder RE & DS (DS only MY23)
860202277
• Two separate air chambers replace coil 
springs and offer multiple tuning options.  
• The QS3 adjustments offer 3 positions for

adjustments.  
• FEATURES: –Optimized lightweight shock 
design. –One piece, aluminum mounting

List all technical specifications with their values:

HANDLEBAR ACCESSORIES
HANDGUARDS
HANDLEBAR MUFFS
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (except Grand Touring 2016 and up)
860202812
•	 Ultra-warm muffs with faux-fur liner for extreme cold 
conditions. 
•	 Thermoformed construction allows muffs to keep their 
shape and provides more space for hand movement. 
•	 Easy to install and remove with gloves on.
•	 Large transparent section allows visibility of control 
switches. 
Note: Never use handlebar muffs with finger throttle lever.
PERFORMANCE SMALL DIAMETER 
HANDLEBAR
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202722 • Black
860201974 • Silver
•	 Narrow design used for more agile precise maneuvers 
found in mountain applications or in trail applications, ideal 
for smaller hand grip.
•	 Smaller diameter provides a lighter, easier grip.
•	 20 mm (0.79”) grip, 22 mm (0.87”) clamper diameter at riser.
•	 Less hand fatigue.
•	 Heater elements and grips included and installed.
BRAKE RESERVOIR GUARD
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow MY24 and prior), REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride
860202519
•	 Increases impact protection for the brake reservoir.
•	 Window to see fluid level.
•	 Cast-aluminum construction.
•	 Detailed technical finish.
EASY THROTTLE
REV Gen5 (except 600 ACE, 900 ACE and 900 ACE Turbo) (except Neo), 
REV Gen4 (except 600 ACE, 900 ACE and 900 ACE Turbo) (except Neo)
860202719
•	 Less hand fatigue.
•	 Throttle closer to the bars allowing a better grip on the 
handlebar.
•	 20% reduction in pressure to use.
•	 Included on Neo+.
HANDGUARD CAPS
Vehicles with Transparent 
Handguards, Dark Smoke 
Handguards or Flexible 
Handguards

Sunburst Yellow / Black
860201345 •

860201347 •

860201648 •  
Lava Grey

Orange Crush / Black
860201649 •  
Manta Green / Black
860202098 •  
Octane Blue / Black

•	 Sold in pairs.
ADJUSTABLE BRAKE LEVER
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202222
•	 Toolless design adjusts easily.
•	 Shape and size is optimized for 1 or 2 fingers.
•	 Total adjustment range of 20 mm/0.8”.
•	 Up to 15.5 mm/0.6” closer or 4.5 mm/0.18” farther away vs. 
standard lever.
SIGNATURE LED LIGHTS FOR 
HANDGUARDS 
REV Gen4, with Transparent, Dark Smoke or Flexible Handguards
860201587

•	 Replace stock handguard cap with LED light.
•	 Include wiring harness.
•	 Sold in pairs.

rectangular profile for aggressive turning capabilities.

protect the runner and reduce darting by carving through existing grooves.

• Sold in pairs.

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

100  SYMPATEX
SYMPATEX KEY 
TECHNOLOGIES
PERFORMANCE
Re>Think Performance - Dynamic 
Breathability 
ln contrast to other membrane technologies,  
the poreless compact Sympatex membrane is 
based on a physical and chemical principle.  
The water-attracting (hydrophilic) part of the 
membrane absorbs the moisture from the 
body and emits it to the outside by 
evaporation. The water vapour molecules are 
transported outwards along the hydrophilic 
molecular chains. The molecular structure 
(hydrophilic components) of the Sympatex 
membrane swells in moisture and therefore 
provides space for water vapour transport 
and fast evaporation.
I'll extract engine displacement, horsepower, track width, track length, suspension travel, and other technical specifications.

based on a physical and chemical principle.  
The water-attracting (hydrophilic) part of the 
membrane absorbs the moisture from the

transported outwards along the hydrophilic 
molecular chains. The molecular structure 
(hydrophilic components) of the Sympatex 
membrane swells in moisture and therefore 
provides space for water vapour transport 
and fast evaporation.

KEY TECHNOLOGIES (ADVEX VS OXYGEN)
What differentiates the Advex Helmet from the Oxygen? For one, the Advex is designed for the more 
active rider. Thanks to the M-FORCE composite shell, it delivers the same incredible performance  
and protection. But where it shines is in versatility: with a superior humidity management system,  
the Advex excels in a variety of weather conditions. Plus, the Advex’s Jet-Style design means 
easier face access, guarantees an improved noise reduction system and gives an edgy look.

PREFILTERS & VENT KITS
FOX SHOCK KITS
PREFILTERS
*While supplies last.
REAR TRACK SHOCKS – 
LIGHTWEIGHT FLOAT 3 QS3 
(CENTER) / 1.5 ZERO QSR WITH 
LOCK-OUT (REAR)
REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride 146”, 154”, 165” with tMotion 
860202278*
•	 This FOX kit features the Lightweight Float 3 center  
and 1.5 Zero with lock-out rear shocks to help your  
sled get skinny. The center shock features QS3 three 
position adjustment for quick and easy compression and 
rebound adjustments. The rear features QS3 compression 
adjustment plus a lockout feature.
•	 FEATURES: 
	– Optimized lightweight shock design.
	– One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
	– High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
	– Internal groove position sensitive technology.
	– Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
	– Fits 146”-165” track lengths.
REAR TRACK SHOCKS – 
LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 ZERO QS3-R 
(CENTER) / LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 ZERO 
QSR WITH LOCKOUT (REAR)
REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride 146”, 154”, 165” with tMotion 
860202276*
•	 The newest version of FOX’s renowned lightweight  
shocks to fit deep snow rear suspensions. 
The center shock features QS3 three position  
adjustment for quick and easy compression and rebound 
adjustments. The rear features QS3 compression 
adjustment plus a lockout feature.
•	 FEATURES: 
	– Optimized lightweight spring and shock design.
	– FOX ice scraper technology (FIST).
	– One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
	– High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
	– Internal groove position sensitive technology.
	– Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
	– Fits 146”–165” track lengths. 
HEAVY-DUTY AIR INTAKE FILTER 
KIT
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202459
•	 Filters prevent water intrusion and snow buildup.
•	 Designed in 2 parts, one fixed and the other removable.
•	 Quickly replace the upper filter in the event of damage 
without tools.
•	 Replacement for stock filters.
REPLACEMENT HEAVY-DUTY AIR 
INTAKE FILTER
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202748
•	 Replacement filter for Heavy-Duty Air Intake Filter Kit 
(860202459).
AIRBOX POP-OFF VALVE FILTER KIT 
REV Gen4 850 E-TEC, 600R E-TEC, 600 EFI
860201755*

position adjustment for quick and easy compression and 
rebound adjustments. The rear features QS3 compression 
adjustment plus a lockout feature.
•	 FEATURES: 
	– Optimized lightweight shock design.
	– One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
	– High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
	– Internal groove position sensitive technology.
	– Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
	– Fits 146”-165” track lengths.
REAR TRACK SHOCKS – 
LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 ZERO QS3-R 
(CENTER) / LIGHTWEIGHT 1.5 ZERO 
QSR WITH LOCKOUT (REAR)
REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride 146”, 154”, 165” with tMotion 
860202276*
•	 The newest version of FOX’s renowned lightweight  
shocks to fit deep snow rear suspensions. 
The center shock features QS3 three position  
adjustment for quick and easy compression and rebound 
adjustments. The rear features QS3 compression 
adjustment plus a lockout feature.
•	 FEATURES: 
	– Optimized lightweight spring and shock design.
	– FOX ice scraper technology (FIST).
	– One piece, aluminum mounting hardware.
	– High-flow velocity-sensitive damping.
	– Internal groove position sensitive technology.
	– Fully rebuildable and re-tunable.
	– Fits 146”–165” track lengths. 
HEAVY-DUTY AIR INTAKE FILTER 
KIT
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202459
•	 Filters prevent water intrusion and snow buildup.
•	 Designed in 2 parts, one fixed and the other removable.
•	 Quickly replace the upper filter in the event of damage 
without tools.
•	 Replacement for stock filters.
REPLACEMENT HEAVY-DUTY AIR 
INTAKE FILTER
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202748
•	 Replacement filter for Heavy-Duty Air Intake Filter Kit 
(860202459).
AIRBOX POP-OFF VALVE FILTER KIT 
REV Gen4 850 E-TEC, 600R E-TEC, 600 EFI

without rear bumper (not illustrated)
• Easy-to-use, sturdy hook for towing applications. 
• Does not fit with Hitch Bumper for Short Tunnel
MULTIMOUNT WINCH KIT
Radien² / Radien-X 500 mm 
Radien-X 600 mm
860202097 • Radien-X 
860203058 • Radien² / Radien-X
• Ergonomic clutch handle. 
• Rugged all-steel gears and bushings, provides more torque and longer life. 
• Can be mounted on the side of the tunnel while riding. 
• Can be mounted in front or rear while using. Includes cable to allow front mounting on 
HD front bumper (860202120 or 860202254) and rear mounting to vehicle’s hitch. 
• Automatic 100% load-holding brake. 
• Sealed solenoid for all weather protection. 
• Corded 10 ft. (3m) weather sealed hand-held remote. 
• Pulling strength capability of 2,000 lb (907 kg). 
• Synthetic rope. 
• Onepiece rope guide. 
• EC Compliant.

R ACKS
LinQ AXE HOLDER 
REV Gen5, REV Gen4, XM, XS, XU,137” and up
860201854
•	 Securely mounts on either side of the tunnel using  
LinQ anchors.
•	 Universal sizing to fit a wide variety of axes.
•	 Can be mounted on either side of the vehicle.
•	 Works even when the Stackable LinQ Deck (860202746) is 
installed.
REAR RACK EXTENSION 
REV-XU Skandic and Expedition
860200700
•	 Delivers increased cargo space.
•	 Does not fit with XU Heavy-Duty Rear Bumper (860201106).
LinQ UNIVERSAL RACK –  
OTHER BRANDS
Other brands of vehicles with tunnel of 15” to 17” wide  
(378 mm to 432 mm)
860202357
•	 Universal rack designed to fit non-LinQ tunnels (Ski‑Doo 
and competitive brands).
•	 Install LinQ accessories on non-LinQ compatible tunnels. 
•	 Allows a multitude of products and configurations on 
almost any sled.
•	 Double the storage by adding another on longer tunnels.
•	 Includes installation hardware for side mounting.
•	 Fits 14.875” to 17” (37.8 cm to 43.2 cm) wide tunnels.
LUGGAGE RACK REINFORCEMENT 
PLATES 
REV-XM, XP, XR, XS, XU Tundra
860200798
•	 Additional reinforcement for your long and short  
rear racks.
•	 Made of high strength steel.
•	 Sold in pairs.
CARGO RACK KIT
REV Gen5 20” Expedition Xtreme, REV Gen4 (Wide) 20” Expedition Xtreme 
and Skandic Sport
860202245
•	 A convenient way to maximize tunnel cargo space.
•	 Required to install the Chain Saw Holder (860201827).
•	 Includes the rack and hardware.
•	 1 1/4” hitch included.
LinQ UNIVERSAL RACK
REV Gen5, REV Gen4
860202208
•	 This Universal Rack can make generic accessories LinQ 
compatible.
•	 Allows a multitude of products and configurations on LinQ 
tunnels.
100    ACCESSORIES    SLEIGH, RACKS & HOLDERS

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

VENT KITS & PREFILTERS
NEW HEAVY-DUTY AIR INTAKE 
FILTER KIT
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202459
• Filters prevent water intrusion and snow buildup.
• Designed in 2 parts, one fixed and the other removable.
• The fixed part has a filter to prevent debris from entering 
the air inlet if the removable part gets damaged.
• Quickly replace the upper filter in the event of damage 
without tools.
• Replacement for stock filters.
• Not compatible on Gen4 models.
NEW REPLACEMENT HEAVY-DUTY 
AIR INTAKE FILTER
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow)
860202748
• Replacement filter for Heavy-Duty Air Intake Filter Kit 
(860202459).
PREFILTER GRILLE KIT 
REV Gen4 (Narrow)
860201224*
• Reduces water and snow intrusion with a clean,  
integrated look.
• Easily removable bottom grille.
• Snap-in top grille.
• Airbox pop-off valve filter.
AIRBOX POP-OFF VALVE FILTER KIT 
REV Gen4 850 E-TEC, 600R E-TEC, 600 EFI
860201755*
HEAVY-DUTY AIR INTAKE FILTERS 
REV Gen4
860201399
• Filters prevent water intrusion and snow buildup.
• Reinforced intake filters, preventing damage in  
heavy use.
• Replacement for stock filters.
• Not compatible with One-Piece Lightweight Hood
PREFILTER GRILLE KIT 
REV-XM, XS
860200610*
• Fully integrated overmolded prefilter snap-in grilles.
• Repels and prevents snow from entering bottom pan  
and hood openings.
• Kit includes easily removable bottom pan grille, lower pan 
cover plugs, hood grille, and air-box pop-off valve prefilter.
REPLACEMENT FRONT PREFILTER 
REV-XM, XS
517305029
*While supplies last.
91 
CATEGORY  ACCESSORIES  87

660032 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
Lynx Active Jersey long sleeve shirt will keep 
you comfortable and protected from the 
top of the mountain down to the trails and 
in diﬀerent activities. Comfortable, technical 
fabric keeps you dry and prevents from 
overheating. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
Comfortable, technical fabric 
Perfect riding ﬁt 
Technical collar construction 
Mesh provides high ventilation 
Longer back for perfect coverage
Red (30), Blue (80)
LYNX ACTIVE JACKET
650148 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
• Lynx Active jacket is lightweight, 
waterproopf and breathable jacket 
for all-purpose use, for example 
cycling, hiking and trail running.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•Long-lasting weather protection 
•Waterproof & breathable 
•Cycling speciﬁc ﬁt 
•Back and underarm ventilation with mesh 
inserts 
•Hand pocket for easy access (jacket can be 
packed into pocket) 
•Reﬂective prints for visibility
Black (90), Grey (09)

Technical collar construction

Red (30), Blue (80)
LYNX ACTIVE PANTS
651136 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION AND TERRAIN:
Lynx Active pants for all-purpose use, 
for example cycling, hiking and trail 
running. These performance pants 
provide comfort when pedalling with 
light weight stretch fabric and many 
technical features. Pants for ultimate 
comfort when riding downhill and trail.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•Dirt and water-repellent, breathable  
•Strech softshell fabric with elastic panels 
•Pre-shaped ﬁt for optimal ride comfort and 
use with knee pads 
•Tapered ﬁtting 
•Hand pockets with zippers 
•Zipped security pocket on leg 
•Full lenght side zippers to be used for 
ventilation also 
•Lynx logo details
Black (90), Grey (09)
LYNX ACTIVE CAP
665287 • Onesize
DESCRIPTION:
Light weight cap for oﬀ-season activities.
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
-
Grey (09)
123  APPAREL  ACTIVE
LYNX ACTIVE OPS
650133 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
Extremely light multiuse riding suit which 
is workable in many outdoor activities, 
environments and conditions. 
Modify the onepiece with unique bottom 
leg zip oﬀs, adjustable to biking shorts!
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 100% waterproof & windproof, optimally 
breathable Sympatex material.
•  Cordura reinforcement fabric on high 
wear areas; seat, inside leg and hem
•  All seams sealed
•  Waterproof YKK zippers
•  Detachable bottom legs with zippers 
(can be adjusted to biking shorts)
•  Preshaped knees and elbows
•  Adjustable cuﬀs with velcro tab
•  Front and back ventilation 
openings with mesh
•  Thigh ventilation
•  Reﬂective weldings
•  Adjustable bottom legs & 
waist velcro system
•  Stretch fabric panel at lower 
back to ease the movement
Army Green (77), Grey (09)

Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2025 specification page:

WOMEN’S 
Black (90), Purple (40), Teal (74)
WOMEN’S WELDED PUFFER JACKET
454793 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
•	 Mid layer welded jacket perfect to wear under a 
shell. 
•	 Use every day and for deep snow riding.
•	 100% polyester.
•	 Insulation: 90% duck down, 10% feather.
•	 Chest pocket with Ski‑Doo branded zipper pull.
•	 Reflective Ski‑Doo logo at left chest.
•	 Fleece lined pockets.
•	 Heat transferred Ski‑Doo logo on inner front flap.
Grey (09), Purple (40)
WOMEN’S HYBRID ZIP-UP TECH FLEECE
454818 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
•	 Technical fleece for warmth and mobility. 
•	 Use every day and as a mid layer on trails.
•	 95% polyester, 5% spandex.
•	 Adjustable hood.
•	 2 hand pockets with Ski‑Doo branded zipper pulls.
•	 Reflective Ski‑Doo logo at left chest and back.
Ivory (97)
WOMEN’S TEDDY FLEECE JACKET
454842 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
•	 New sherpa fleece made to keep you warm and 
cozy in style.
•	 100% polyester.
•	 Mid weight polar fleece for additional warmth.
•	 Full zip jacket.
•	 1 zipped chest pocket.
•	 Reflective Ski‑Doo logo at chest and back neck.
•	 2 hand pockets.
Green (70), Ivory (97)
WOMEN’S LIFESTYLE SKI‑DOO PLAID 
OVERSHIRT
454805 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
•	 Warm and soft plaid overshirt. 
•	 100% cotton
•	 4-hole plastic Ski‑Doo engraved button. 
•	 Fleece lined hand pockets.
•	 Ski‑Doo embroidery at back.
Black (90), Camo (37)
WOMEN’S SNAP-UP POLAR FLEECE OVERSHIRT
454824 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL
•	 New polar fleece overshirt.
•	 Made for everyday wear.
•	 100% polyester.
•	 Front opening with embossed Ski‑Doo snaps.
•	 Soft polar fleece.

X-TEAM NYLON GLOVES
446351 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Insulated and breathable glove, perfect for active 
rides.
• Use for trail and deep snow riding.
Performance: 

Dextirity 
Warmth
• Top hand: 200 g PrimaLoft® Gold 
• Palm: 133 g PrimaLoft® grip control.
• Waterproof, windproof and breathable glove insert.
• Naturally moisture-wicking and antimicrobial wool 
blend lining.
• Boxed fingertips to avoid air infiltration.
• Grip control technology for a better grip in palm.
• Touch screen index finger.
• Visor wiper.
MEN’S

insulated glove
• Use for trail and deep snow riding.

Dextirity 
Warmth
• Top hand: 200 g PrimaLoft® Gold

• Waterproof, windproof and breathable glove insert.

blend lining.

Black (90)

446297 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Soft, durable, flexible and breathable gloves. 
• Use for trail and deep snow riding.
Performance: 

 Waterproofness 
Dextirity 
Warmth
• 77% nylon, 23% polyurethane.
• Stretch wrist for easy in and out.
Black (90)
GRIP GLOVES
446323 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• High performance insulated glove with great grip 
feel. 
• Use for trail and deep snow riding.
Performance: 

Dextirity 
Warmth
• Waterproof, windproof and breathable glove insert.
• Inside adhesive technology for a better grip control, 
added tactility and dexterity.
• Light insulation at backhand only (85 gr Primaloft 
Gold), for warmth without compromising grip.
• Print design on backhand to minimize snow 
accumulation.
• Rubber finger print for improved grip.
• Fully shaped fingers.
• Box fingertips to avoid air infiltration.
• Neoprene wrist with adjustment.
• Padded and reinforced palm.
• Leather palm construction for toughness.
• Suede at back thumb for lens wipe. 
• Conductive leather at index.
Black (90), Charcoal Grey (07), Dark Navy (16)
MICRO-FLEECE GLOVES
446338 • S, M, L

• Use as everyday gloves.
• 92% polyester, 8% spandex.
• Heat embossed logo. 
• Touch screen finger tip.
• Anti-peeling fleece.
• Elastic at wrist.
Black (90)
MOUNTAIN GLOVES
446364 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

 Waterproofness 
Dextirity 
Warmth

insert.

• Conductive leather at index.
• 100 g PrimaLoft® Gold to top hand insulation.
