GLOVES
Army Green (77), Black (90)
EXPEDITION GLOVES
446337 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Extra warm gloves for comfort in all riding 
conditions.
• Use for trail and deep snow riding.
Performance: 

 Waterproofness 
Dextirity 
Warmth
• Top hand: 200 g PrimaLoft® Gold.
• Palm: 133g PrimaLoft® Gold. 
• Waterproof, windproof and breathable glove insert.
• Naturally moisture-wicking and antimicrobial wool 
blend lining.
• Leather palm and fingers with grip reinforcement.
• Touch screen index finger.
• Nose wipe on thumb.
Black (90)
EXPEDITION RADIANT GLOVES
446346 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Extra warm gloves for comfort in all riding 
conditions.
• Use for trail and deep snow riding.
Performance: 

 Waterproofness 
Dextirity 
Warmth
• Top hand: 200 g PrimaLoft® Gold.
• Palm: 133g PrimaLoft® Gold.
• Waterproof, windproof and breathable glove insert.
• Moisture-wicking fleece lining.
• Includes 2 batteries and a charger
• Leather palm and fingers with grip reinforcement.
• Touch screen index finger.
• Nose wipe on thumb.
• Clim8 heated technology.
UNISEX
MEN’S
Black (90)
BC ASPECT LONG GLOVES
446352 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Breathable glove with some insulation perfect for 
moderate temperatures.
• Use in deep snow riding.
Performance: 

Dextirity 
Warmth
• Pittards® goat leather - resistant to the elements, 
stain resistant and durable leather.
• Sympatex® fabric 2L. 
• Insulated backhand and palm, for warmth without 
compromising grip (60gr Primaloft Gold / Grip 
control at palm).
• Padded knuckles in nylon Cordura® for better 
protection.
• Outdry technology membrane waterproof and 
windproof. 
• Maximum breathability with perforated leather 
insert between fingers. 
• Xstatic mesh lined for antibacterial and stay dry 
moisture managment.
• Wide and long cuff with elastic cord adjustment 
and puller at hem to fit over the sleeve.
• Inside adhesive technology for a better grip control.
• Shaped and articulated fingers for maximum grip 
control.
• Conductive leather at index.
• Wiper on left index + suede at back thumb for lens 
wipe.
Black (90)
BC ASPECT SHORT GLOVES
446354 • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
• Breathable glove with some insulation perfect for 
moderate temperatures.
• Use in deep snow riding.
Performance: 

Dextirity 
Warmth
• Pittards® goat leather - resistant to the elements, 
stain resistant and durable leather.
• Sympatex® fabric 2L. 
• Insulated backhand and palm, for warmth without 
compromising grip (60gr Primaloft Gold / Grip 
control at palm).
• Padded knuckles in nylon Cordura® for better 
protection.
• Outdry technology membrane waterproof and 
windproof. 
• Maximum flexibility with stretch fabric insertion at 
knucklebone.
• Xstatic mesh lined for antibacterial and stay dry 
moisture managment.
• Wrist strap adjustment with velcro to fit under a 
sleeve.
• Extra grip leather at palm and thumb. 
• Shaped and articulated fingers for maximum grip 
control.
• Conductive leather at index.
• Wiper on left index + suede at back thumb for lens 
wipe.

Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2026 specification page:

SLEIGH, RACKS & HOLDERS
ACCESSORIES
SLEIGH
R ACKS
HAWSE GUIDE
860201143
•	 Replaces Roller Fairlead for longer cable life.
•	 For use with synthetic cable only.
•	 Replaces Roller Fairlead when Synthetic Cable (715004254) 
is installed.
LinQ SLEIGH
Fits on vehicles equipped with Tongue Hitch
860202569
•	 Comes with an easy to retract protective cover that 
prevents snow intrusion while still allowing the installation 
of LinQ accessories on the sleigh top. 
•	 LinQ accessories can be installed on top and inside  
(LinQ Cargo Base Kit not included).
•	 Made of high-molecular-weight polyethylene. 
•	 2-part removable cover.
•	 Rain resistant. 
•	 Carbide ready (860201044).
•	 Slots for dividers precast in. (Dividers not included.)
•	 Dimensions 81” (206 cm) L x 33” (84 cm) W x 21” (54 cm) H.
•	 Volume 485 L (110 US gallon, 29 597 cu in).
•	 Weight capacity: 750 lb (340 kg) TOTAL (including top);  
max on top 75 lb (34 kg). 
•	 Spring dampened pull bar.
STACKABLE LinQ DECK
REV Gen5 20” and 24”, REV Gen4 (Wide) 20” and 24”
860202746
•	 Doubles the LinQ mounting surface area of the tunnel 
positions 1 and 2.
•	 Top deck maximum weight capacity: 50 lb (22 kg), total 
tunnel weight capacity with Stackable LinQ Deck installed: 
100 lb (44 kg).
•	 Steel and aluminum structure is covered with 
polypropylene for long life.
•	 Eight LinQ attachment points for single mount accessories 
like LinQ Tool Holder (860201846) and LinQ Working Light 
(860202380).
•	 Lever operated latch opens/closes the deck.
•	 Equipped with a gas strut that holds the deck open for 
easier access to cargo underneath.
•	 Reinforcement kit included to give extra protection to the 
Cargo Rack Kit when Stackable LinQ Deck is installed.
•	 Ability to leave equipment installed on the top deck when 
there is no passenger seat installed.
•	 Requires LinQ Cargo Base Kit (860201806) for installation 
of an accessory using position 2 on top of the Stackable 
LinQ Deck.
•	 Requires installation of Cargo Rack Kit (860202245) for 
Expedition Xtreme and Skandic Sport.
•	 We recommend changing the stock rear springs for stiffer 
springs when installing the Stackable LinQ Deck.
2” RECEIVER FOR HEAVY-DUTY 
REAR BUMPER 
Fits on XU Heavy-Duty Rear Bumpers WT (860200991) or  
SWT (860201106)
860201062
•	 Easy installation.
•	 Standard 2” size for wide compatibility.
•	 Allows quick switching of towing hook-ups or winch use.
•	 Does not fit with stock tongue hitch 2016–2018.
MULTI-MOUNT HD 2500 WINCH
REV Gen5 20” and 24”, REV Gen4 (Wide) 20” and 24”
Expedition and Skandic XU
860202331
860200992*
•	 Integrated carry handle, to easily manage winch, mounting.
•	 Side Tunnel mount for easy access and secure storage.
•	 Ergonomic clutch handle. 
•	 Rugged all-steel gears and bushings, provides more torque 
and longer life. 
•	 Automatic 100% load-holding brake. 
•	 Sealed solenoid for all-weather protection. 
•	 Weather-sealed handlebar mounted switch. 
•	 Corded 10 ft. (3 m) weather sealed hand-held remote. 
•	 Pulling strength capability of 2,500 lb (1,134 kg). 
•	 50 ft. of 3/16” (15.2 m of 4.8 mm) wire steel cable. 
•	 Heavy-duty 4-way roller fairlead. 
•	 EC compliant.
•	 Fits Heavy-Duty Hitch Rear Bumper (860201795) and 1 1/4” 
Trailer Hitch Receiver.
98    ACCESSORIES    CATEGORY
98    ACCESSORIES    SLEIGH, RACKS & HOLDERS

DELUXE TOOL KIT
860202029

•	 Features high-quality tools.
•	 Includes:
	– Stainless steel open end/ring end wrenches; 8–10 mm, 
10–13 mm, 12–14 mm, 15–17 mm, 16–19 mm.
	– 1/4 drive ratchet with 4” extension,

Allen 4 – 6 – 8 and Phillips #2.
	– Long-nose vise-grip.
	– Spring hook tool.
UNDER-SEAT STORAGE BAG – 11 L
REV Gen5 20” and 24”, REV Gen4 (Wide) 20” and 24”
860202767
•	 Installs inside the 4 US gallon (15 liter, 915 cu in) underseat 
storage that comes stock on 20” and 24” models.
•	 3 US gallon (11 liter, 671 cu in) capacity.
•	 Insulated to protect from outside temperatures.
•	 Durable polyester construction.
•	 Integrated handles make transportation easy.
NEW 10.25” TOUCHSCREEN DISPLAY 
RELOCATOR
REV Gen5 with 10.25” Touchscreen Display (except Deep Snow)
860202904
•	 Ideal for people looking to have the display mounted higher 
on the vehicle.
•	 Raises the display by 2.5” to improve screen visibility when 
riding in a sat down position.
•	 Reduces hand reach by 1.5” improving access to the 
touchscreen.
•	 Doubles glovebox storage capacity for a total of 6 liter.
•	 Sliding-door design allows access to full opening of the 
glovebox.
•	 Replaces stock storage compartment cover.
•	 Requires a windshield for installation.
•	 Retrofit for vehicles with a 10.25” Touchscreen Display.

103  ACCESSORIES  COOLING
COOLING
WHEEL KIT Ø147MM
Radien-X Commander
860202730
• Wheel kit for Commander improves cooling for slides when driving in icy conditions
FRONT RADIATOR KIT
Radien-X / Radien² (4-stroke)
860202465
• Provides additional cooling in extreme conditions.
• For all vehicles with 600 ACE, 900 ACE, 900 ACE Turbo, 900 ACE Turbo R engine.
AIR RADIATOR KIT
Radien² (except Deep Snow)
860202796
• Provides additional cooling in extreme conditions. 
• Designed for 600R and 850 E-TEC engines. 
• Electric start is necessary during assembly for optimal functionality.
ICE SCRATCHERS
Radien-X 600 mm
860202485
Provide additional lubrication in hard and icy conditions.
• Rail mounted, small, light.
• Design expands on coil concept to allow reversing without damage.
• Easily stored when not in use.
AIR RADIATOR KIT
Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860201860
• Provides additional cooling in extreme conditions. 
• For 600R and 850 E-TEC engines (electric start is required when assembling).
• For 600 EFI engine (515179331 and 515178537 wiring harnesses reguired for installation).
ICE SCRATCHERS
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X
860201728
Provide additional lubrication in hard and icy conditions.
• Rail mounted, small, light.
• Design expands on coil concept to allow reversing without damage.
• Easily stored when not in use.
• Standard on all Shredder models (2023 and up) and BoonDocker DS models (2022 and older).

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this LYNX 2026 specification page:

48  ACCESSORIES  STORAGE
LUGGAGE RACK
Radien-X 500 mm
860202311
• Maximizes tunnel cargo capacity.
LinQ REAR DECK
Radien-X 500 mm
860202415
• Extra LinQ deck on rear tunnel allows more storage capasity. 
• Two LinQ positons on the deck, so you can stack more LinQ accessories there. 
• Hinges on the back and LinQ lock in front allows easy access under the deck. 
• Places for binding straps. 
• Can combine e.g. under the deck 5 pcs of Under Deck storage 
boxes (860202475) and 135L box on the deck. 
• Requires Luggage Rack (860202311). 
• Note max cargo capacity 58 kg.
UNDER DECK STORAGE BOX 7 L
Radien-X 500 mm
860202475
• Under the deck fits 5 boxes. Capasity of one box is 7 liter.
• Can be used as dedicated for specific items e.g. for fishing, food, tools, campfire items
• Rack locks the boxes firmly on their places and prevent them moving or clattering.
NEW
STACKABLE LinQ DECK
Radien² Commander 
860202746
• Doubles the LinQ mounting surface area of the tunnel positions 1 and 2.
• Top deck maximum weight capacity: 22 kg, total tunnel weight 
capacity with Stackable LinQ Deck installed: 44 kg.
• Steel and aluminum structure is covered with polypropylene for long life.
• Eight LinQ attachment points for single mount accessories like LinQ Tool 
Holder (860201846) and LinQ Working Light (860202380).
• Lever operated latch opens/closes the deck.
• Equipped with a gas strut that holds the deck open for easier access to cargo underneath.
• Reinforcement kit included to give extra protection to the Cargo 
Rack Kit when Stackable LinQ Deck is installed.
• Ability to leave equipment installed on the top deck when there is no passenger seat installed.
• We recommend changing the stock rear springs for stiffer 
springs when installing the Stackable LinQ Deck.

• Reinforcement kit included to give extra protection to the Cargo 
Rack Kit when Stackable LinQ Deck is installed.
• Ability to leave equipment installed on the top deck when there is no passenger seat installed.
• We recommend changing the stock rear springs for stiffer 
springs when installing the Stackable LinQ Deck.

List all technical specifications with their values:

VENT KITS & PREFILTERS
COOLING & LUBRICATION
VENT KIT FOR SIDE PANELS 
REV-XM 
860200609*
• Fast air-evacuating overmolded prefilter vents.
• Easy do-it-yourself installation onto premarked production 
side panels.
• 1¾” hole saw required.
• Use in conjunction with your stock vehicle panels.
• For racing applications only.
• Kit includes vents for both side panels (24x).
• Foam with foil included.
VENT KIT 
All models
860200684*
• Assortment of replacement or additional vents (7x) with 
hardware.
• Can be installed on most body panels with relatively flat 
surface and 2.5 to 3.2 mm thickness.
LinQ LIGHTWEIGHT SNOWFLAP 
EXTENSION
REV Gen5, REV Gen4 (with short tunnel)
860202393
• Removable snowflap extension that helps engine cooling in 
hardpack, low and icy snow conditions when installed.
• Stows on the tunnel when not in use. 
• Installs on the stock lightweight snowflap of  
Summit and Freeride models with short tunnel.
• Compatible with stock and hitch bumpers. 
LinQ REMOVABLE SNOW FLAP 
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 Freeride and Summit 154” and longer
REV Gen4 146” Backcountry, Summit, Freeride: specific installation 
required, see instruction sheet for details
860201914
• Lets you play in the deep powder with no restriction.
• Retains cooling properties when installed.
• Stows on tunnel when not in use.
• Installs with stock snowflap.
• Does not fit with Hitch Rear Bumper.
• Does not fit short tunnel.
*While supplies last.
PREFILTER GRILLE KIT
REV-XU Expedition, Skandic 
860201152*
• Keeps snow and moisture out, lets air in.
• Plastic frame molded over mesh for strength.
• Installs easily.
• Totally integrated design.
• Kit includes filters for bottom pan and hood openings.
• Not compatible with Heavy-Duty Front Bumper with 2” 
Receiver (860200987).
92
88  ACCESSORIES  CATEGORY
88  ACCESSORIES  COOLING & LUBRICATION

TEC H N O LO GY  W ITH  A N  E D G E
DYNAMIC BREATHABILITY WITH SYMPATEX®
In contrast to other membrane technologies, the poreless compact Sympatex membrane is based on a physical and 
chemical principle. The water-attracting (hydophilic) part of the membrane absorbs the moisture from the body and emits it 
to the outside by evaporation. The water vapor molecules are transported outwards along the hydrophilic molecular chains. 
The molecular structure (hydrophilic components) of the Sympatex membrane swells with moisture and therefore provides 
space for water transport and fast evaporation.
100% WATERPROOF
100% WINDPROOF
OPTIMALLY BREATHABLE
DURABLE
CO2 NEUTRAL
PTFE-FREE
RECYCLABLE AND RECYCLED
/  
/
3  L AYE R S 
Full mobility and freedom of movement are a given with our 
Sympatex membrane. With a 3D optimized fit and coupled with 
our 3-layer lightweight stretch, it delivers comfort at every turn.

messages.content:
Extract all snowmobile model information from this SKIDOO 2026 specification page:

For safety reasons, the battery cannot be charged while riding. Considering the increased risks inherent when 
charging a battery, BRP has chosen NOT to make this action possible to guarantee maximum user safety.
Features may vary depending on the vehicle.
COMMUNICATION SYSTEM  
AND HELMET ACCESSORIES
Black (90)
ADVEX HELMET-INTEGRTED LED UTILITY LIGHT
929085 • One size
•	 Accessory for Advex helmet.
•	 Utility flashlight.
•	 Tool-free installation.
•	 3 power modes.
•	 3 AAA batteries (battery box to install in the helmet, 
batteries not included).
•	 Using the Vibe Communication System Battery.
•	 Connection of the Vibe communication system  
by E-LinQ (electric power supplied by the vehicle).
•	 Easy one-handed on/off without a button 
(by opening/closing).
•	 High level of illumination, over 100 lumens.
•	 ECE 22.06 certification for helmet.
Matte Black (93)
VIBE UNIVERSAL COMM SYSTEM BY BRP
929105 • One size
•	 VIBE UNIVERSAL Comm System with superior audio 
quality for every BRP helmet.
•	 Sound by harman/kardon®.
•	 Mesh only system: Robust Reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh device.
•	 Battery capacity Up to 12 hours of talk time 
(8 hours at -18°C/-0°F).
•	 One-Click-to-Connect simplicity with other mesh 
riders.
•	 Mesh Intercom™ features superior audio quality.
•	 Up to 2 km / 1.2 miles in open terrain. Range can be 
extended with multiple riders.
•	 Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows users 
to switch between 9 comm channels.
•	 Convenience of voice-activated digital assistant 
access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
•	 Rapid-Charging.
•	 Glove-friendly interface.
•	 Compatible with all BRP helmets.
•	 When paired with the BRP Go App!, you can 
manage many settings such as : Sound, mesh 
channels options, software updates, battery level. 
Handlebars controls.
Matte Black (93)
VIBE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM BY BRP
929086 • One size
•	 VIBE Comm System with superior audio quality for 
the ADVEX helmet.
•	 Sound by harman/kardon®.
•	 Mesh only system: Robust Reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh device.
•	 Battery capacity Up to 18 hours of talk time 
(12 hours at -18°C/-0°F).
•	 One-Click-to-Connect with other mesh riders.
•	 Up to 2 km / 1.2 miles in open terrain. Range can be 
extended with multiple riders.
•	 Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows users 
to switch between 9 comm channels.
•	 Convenience of voice-activated digital assistant 
access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
•	 Rapid-Charging.
•	 Glove-friendly interface.
•	 Compatible with all ADVEX helmets.
•	 Never run out of power when installed in ADVEX 
Radiant helmet version and plugged in your 
Ski‑Doo.*Will not charge the battery.
•	 Compatible with the 10.25” touchscreen display : 
Listen to music, place/receive calls, and use phone 
voice assistance 
•	 When paired with the BRP Go App!, you can 
manage many settings such as : Sound, mesh 
channels options, softwares updates, battery level.
Handlebars controls.
Black (90)
OXYGEN LED UTILITY LIGHT
929006 • One size
•	 Accessory for Oxygen helmet.
•	 Oxygen – Chin LEDBEAM Utility Light.
•	 2 AAA batteries (batteries not included).

metadata.text:
For safety reasons, the battery cannot be charged while riding. Considering the increased risks inherent when 
charging a battery, BRP has chosen NOT to make this action possible to guarantee maximum user safety.
Features may vary depending on the vehicle.
COMMUNICATION SYSTEM  
AND HELMET ACCESSORIES
Black (90)
ADVEX HELMET-INTEGRTED LED UTILITY LIGHT
929085 • One size
•	 Accessory for Advex helmet.
•	 Utility flashlight.
•	 Tool-free installation.
•	 3 power modes.
•	 3 AAA batteries (battery box to install in the helmet, 
batteries not included).
•	 Using the Vibe Communication System Battery.
•	 Connection of the Vibe communication system  
by E-LinQ (electric power supplied by the vehicle).
•	 Easy one-handed on/off without a button 
(by opening/closing).
•	 High level of illumination, over 100 lumens.
•	 ECE 22.06 certification for helmet.
Matte Black (93)
VIBE UNIVERSAL COMM SYSTEM BY BRP
929105 • One size
•	 VIBE UNIVERSAL Comm System with superior audio 
quality for every BRP helmet.
•	 Sound by harman/kardon®.
•	 Mesh only system: Robust Reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh device.
•	 Battery capacity Up to 12 hours of talk time 
(8 hours at -18°C/-0°F).
•	 One-Click-to-Connect simplicity with other mesh 
riders.
•	 Mesh Intercom™ features superior audio quality.
•	 Up to 2 km / 1.2 miles in open terrain. Range can be 
extended with multiple riders.
•	 Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows users 
to switch between 9 comm channels.
•	 Convenience of voice-activated digital assistant 
access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
•	 Rapid-Charging.
•	 Glove-friendly interface.
•	 Compatible with all BRP helmets.
•	 When paired with the BRP Go App!, you can 
manage many settings such as : Sound, mesh 
channels options, software updates, battery level. 
Handlebars controls.
Matte Black (93)
VIBE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM BY BRP
929086 • One size
•	 VIBE Comm System with superior audio quality for 
the ADVEX helmet.
•	 Sound by harman/kardon®.
•	 Mesh only system: Robust Reliability compatible 
with all Sena Mesh device.
•	 Battery capacity Up to 18 hours of talk time 
(12 hours at -18°C/-0°F).
•	 One-Click-to-Connect with other mesh riders.
•	 Up to 2 km / 1.2 miles in open terrain. Range can be 
extended with multiple riders.
•	 Multi-channel protocol in Open Mesh allows users 
to switch between 9 comm channels.
•	 Convenience of voice-activated digital assistant 
access (“Hey Google”/”Hey Siri”).
•	 Rapid-Charging.
•	 Glove-friendly interface.
•	 Compatible with all ADVEX helmets.
•	 Never run out of power when installed in ADVEX 
Radiant helmet version and plugged in your 
Ski‑Doo.*Will not charge the battery.
•	 Compatible with the 10.25” touchscreen display : 
Listen to music, place/receive calls, and use phone 
voice assistance 
•	 When paired with the BRP Go App!, you can 
manage many settings such as : Sound, mesh 
channels options, softwares updates, battery level.
Handlebars controls.
Black (90)
OXYGEN LED UTILITY LIGHT
929006 • One size

•	 Oxygen – Chin LEDBEAM Utility Light.
•	 2 AAA batteries (batteries not included).

NEO SUSPENSION
K YB SHOCKS
RAS X FRONT SUSPENSION 
UPGRADE KIT (WITHOUT SHOCKS)
REV Gen4 MXZ, Renegade and Grand Touring with RAS 3 front suspension
860202187
•	 Update your sled RAS 3 to the new RAS X configuration.
•	 Provides wider ski stance offering sure-footed cornering 
with improved bump performance.
•	 Kit includes new spindles and A-arms and all necessary 
hardware.
•	 Compatible with Pilot X skis.
FRONT SUSPENSION KIT (36”) 
REV-XM, XS, XP
860201153
•	 To update your sled to the REV-XM Summit X with T3 
package.
•	 Delivers the agility of the original S-36 handling package, 
plus the benefits of the RAS 2.
•	 Better straightline tracking on big bumps.
•	 Lighter weight.
•	 Great styling.
•	 HPG shocks.
•	 Ski stance adjustable from 35.7” (90 cm) to 37.4” (95 cm).
SWAY BAR QUICK-DISCONNECT 
LINK KIT 
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow), REV Gen4 Summit and Freeride, XM and XP 
Summit 2013 to 2020
860200811
•	 Kit allows you to utilize the benefits of a sway bar on rough 
trails and quickly disconnect it for sidehilling.
•	 Sold individually.
RETROFITTABLE SWAY BAR
Neo
860202206
•	 Kit gives the rider the benefit of a sway bar for stability  
on trails.
KYB PERFORMANCE SHOCKS KIT
REV Gen5 and REV Gen4 with RAS X suspension (except SAS) 
860202466
•	 Race Edition KYB shock absorbers. 
•	 Piggyback 46 mm bodies with 16 mm shaft. 
•	 Feature separate adjustments for high- and low-speed 
compression plus rebound damping. 
•	 Kashima coated for friction-free performance and long life.
•	 Fits RAS X front suspension.
SHOCK UPGRADE KIT
Neo Base
860202210
•	 Premium front shock upgrade for base Neo model.
•	 KYB 36 mm high pressure gas shock absorber.
•	 Spring preload adjustment.
•	 Reverse mounting (body up) to minimize unsprung weight.
REAR SUSPENSION COIL
Neo
860202457
•	 Higher capacity springs for use with passengers or larger 
riders.

56  ACCESSORIES  SEATS & ACCESSORIES
SEATS & ACCESSORIES
TRAIL LinQ PASSENGER PREMIUM 
NON-HEATED SEAT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400mm
860202917
• The ultimate modular seating solution. 
• Quickly changes from riding solo to riding with a passenger.
• Provides comfortable, ergonomically correct positions for both driver and passenger.
• Compatible with LinQ locking system.
• Includes Passenger Backrest (860202659) and seat handles.
• Requires LinQ 1+1 Removable Rack or LinQ 1 + 1 Rack for installation.
• Compatible with LinQ Passenger Seat Heated Grips (860202535). 
• Fit to Shredder and Retrofit for Radien & Radien-X 400 mm requires Driver Seat (860202781) 
or Driver Heated Seat (860202782) for installation.  
TRAIL LinQ PASSENGER PREMIUM 
HEATED SEAT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400mm
860202536
• The ultimate modular seating solution. 
• Quickly changes from riding solo to riding with a passenger.
• Provides comfortable, ergonomically correct positions for both driver and passenger. 
• Includes heated seat, heated handles and accessory plug in.
• Compatible with LinQ locking system.
• Passenger Backrest (860202659) is included.
• Requires LinQ 1+1 Removable Rack or LinQ 1 + 1 Rack for installation
• Fit to Shredder and Retrofit for Radien & Radien-X 400 mm requires Driver 
Seat (860202781) or Driver Heated Seat (860202782) for installation.
LinQ PASSENGER SEAT - SPORT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202325
• The ultimate modular seating solution for 400 mm (16”) models. 
• Quickly changes from riding solo to riding with a passenger.
• Provides comfortable, ergonomically correct positions for both driver and passenger. 
• Easy tool-less clip in attachment with the LinQ system.
• Requires LinQ 1+1 rack or LinQ 1+1 removable rack for installation.
• Compatible with LinQ Lock kits, Heated Handgrips (860202535) and Backrest (860202659)
• Fit to Shredder and Retrofit for Radien & Radien-X 400 mm requires Driver 
Seat (860202781) or Driver Heated Seat (860202782) for installation.
PASSENGER BACKREST
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400mm
860202659
• Passenger backrest compatible with LinQ Passenger 
Seat - Sport (860202325) for more comfort.

860202208
•	 This Universal Rack can make generic accessories LinQ 
compatible.

tunnels.
•	 See table on pages 88 and 89 for requirements.
LinQ UNIVERSAL RACK –  
OTHER BRANDS
Other brands of vehicles with tunnel of 15” to 17” wide  
(378 mm to 432 mm)
860202357
•	 Universal rack designed to fit non-LinQ tunnels (Ski‑Doo 
and competitive brands).
•	 Install LinQ accessories on non-LinQ compatible tunnels. 
•	 Allows a multitude of products and configurations on 
almost any sled.
•	 Double the storage by adding another on longer tunnels.
•	 Includes installation hardware for side mounting.
•	 Fits 14.875 to 17 inch (37.8 cm to 43.2 cm) wide tunnels.

REV-XU Skandic and Expedition
860200914

(860201806).

TRACTION & CONTROL
SKIS
RAPID ADJUST SKI STANCE
Fits all Pilot 7.4, Pilot X, Pilot RX and DS-4 skis
Fits all DS-1, DS-2, DS-3 
860202334
860201619
Wide ski stance
Narrow ski stance
•	 Quick toolless design adjusts ski stance in seconds.
•	 Go from on-trail stability to off-trail agility. 
•	 Allows for 2” of ski stance adjustment.
•	 Sold in pairs.
•	 Needs Rubber Stopper Pads (505074748) to install on DS-1 
and DS-2 skis (sold individually).
PILOT X CONVERSION KIT 
REV Gen5 Renegade Sport, Grand Touring Sport, MXZ Neo,  
REV Gen4 MXZ, Renegade and Grand Touring
860202310
•	 Upgrades earlier models to the latest Pilot X skis.
•	 Completes kit including 2 Pilot X ski assemblies with pre-
installed handles, 2 carbides and all required hardware.
PILOT TS CONVERSION KIT
REV Gen4 MXZ, Renegade, Grand Touring
860201484
•	 Upgrade to the revolutionary adjustable Pilot TS skis.
•	 REV-XS 2016 and up with RAS 2, REV-XP, XR, XS with 42” 
RAS 2 and 2016 spindle (860201353).
•	 Does not fit with RAS X suspension, fits only on RAS-3 
suspension.
PILOT 7.4 UPGRADE KIT
860202119 • Black
•	 Upgrade earlier models to the latest Pilot 7.4 skis.
•	 Complete kit including 2 Pilot 7.4 ski assemblies with pre-
installed handles, 2 carbides and all required hardware.
•	 Does not fit with LTS suspension.
PILOT 5.7 SKI UPGRADE KIT
860200524 • Black
•	 Complete kit for upgrading earlier snowmobile models.
•	 Includes 2 skis, 2 handles with rivet kit, 2 Expedition 
carbides and all required hardware.
PILOT DS-2 SKI KIT
860201487 • Black
•	 Complete kit includes 2 ski assemblies with pre-installed 
handles, 2 Expedition carbides and all required hardware. 
PILOT 7.4 SKI LINER
Pilot 7.4 skis
860202390 • Black
•	 Provides additional flotation and reduces ski wear.
•	 260 mm (10.25”) wide.
•	 Same durable material as 7.4 skis.
•	 Sold in pairs.
DEEP SNOW LIGHTWEIGHT SKI 
SPINDLE KIT 
REV Gen5 (Deep Snow) 2023 to 2025, REV Gen4 with 36” ski stance
860201976
•	 Improves front dynamics when sidehilling.
•	 400 g lighter than stock spindle.
•	 Standard on Summit X with Expert Package and Freeride 
154”–165” 2020 and up.
PILOT DS-4 SKI KIT
860202721 • Black
•	 2-stage keel design improves flotation. 
•	 Entire keel has been moved forward compared to DS-3.
•	 Revised rear portion improves consistency in deep snow.
•	 Straighter tracking in rough conditions.
PILOT TX SKI CONVERSION KIT
REV Gen5 MXZ, Renegade and Grand Touring,  
REV Gen4 MXZ, Renegade and Grand Touring
860202869
•	 Upgrades to the adjustable Pilot TX skis.
•	 Does not fit with RAS-3 suspension (compatible only with 
RAS-X suspensions).
PILOT RX SKI KIT
REV Gen5 (MXZ, Renegade and Backcountry),  
REV Gen4 (MXZ, Renegade and Backcountry)
860202967
•	 Remarkable cornering predictability in various snow conditions 
and exceptional control in loose snow. 
•	 1st keel: Positive bite on hard packed trails.
•	 2nd keel: Improved grip in softer snow conditions.
•	 47 mm total vertical wall in loose snow with 645 mm long keel.
•	 250 cm2 of lateral area.
•	 160 mm wide for great flotation on soft snow.
•	 Complete kit including 2 Pilot RX ski assemblies with pre-
installed handles, 2 carbides and all required hardware.

messages.content:
List all technical specifications with their values:

ROTAX
® ENGINES
Experience the advantage of XPS. Oil and care products engineered to extend the life of your ride, tested in the 
world’s harshest conditions, and designed to optimize your vehicle’s performance. Learn more at XPSlubricants.com
1  Observed metric horsepower based on internal dyno test performed in optimal conditions. 
2 Data based on internal engineering trail testing.
3  Data based on internal engineering trail testing in ECO mode.
4 Based on retail sale results as of December 31, 2019.
ROTAX 2-STROKE ENGINES
Heart-thumping power, lightweight  
design, proven reliability – E-TEC 
direct-injection engine technology  
delivers the most sought-after attributes 
in the snowmobile industry.
Our lineup of 2-stroke engines now 
includes the brand-new 600 EFI 
(Electronic Fuel Injection) engine. 
Reliable, affordable and easy to use, it’s 
an entry-level engine that far exceeds 
what you thought an entry-level engine 
had to be.
With E-TEC engine lineup you also get:
• Industry-leading fuel economy2
• Excellent oil economy
• Virtually no smoke or smell
• Light, linear throttle pull
• Automatic summerization process
850 E-TEC TURBO R
• 180 hp up to 2400 meters1
• World’s first factory-built 2-stroke 
turbo
850 E-TEC
• 165 horsepower1
• Down to 12.3 L/100 km2
600R E-TEC
• 125 horsepower1
• Down to 11.3 L/100 km2
600 EFI
• 85 horsepower1
• Down to 13.3 L/100 km2

E-TEC engines are the best-selling 
2-stroke engines in snowmobiling.4
ROTAX ACE™ 4-STROKE 
ENGINES
With the Advanced Combustion 
Efficiency (ACE) family of engines, 
BRP engineers optimized the 
combustion system, reduced 
mechanical friction, and freed intake 
and exhaust breathing. The result is 
the most efficient engines in 
snowmobiling. Not only are they 
efficient, they’re a pleasure to operate 
and own. Very little maintenance is 
required; they run smoothly and 
produce a nice, solid – yet quiet – 
sound.
900 ACE TURBO R 
• Rotax-designed turbocharger
• 180 horsepower1
• Cable-activated throttle  
with reconfigured iTC
900 ACE TURBO  
– 130 WITH iTC
• 130 horsepower1
• Down to 12.1 L/100 km3
900 ACE WITH iTC
• 3 cylinders
• 95 horsepower1 
• Down to 10.8 L/100 km3
600 ACE WITH iTC
• 2 cylinders
• 62 horsepower1
• Down to 8 L/100 km – the most fuel-
efficient in the entire industry3
ACE engines are the best-selling 
4-stroke engines in snowmobiling.4
INTELLIGENT  
THROTTLE CONTROL
Standard on the ACE engines, the iTC™ 
system delivers a whole different 
snowmobiling experience.
• Driving Modes: A button on the 
console enables you to select one 
of three driving modes. Standard 
mode ensures a smooth start and 
linear acceleration; Sport enables full 
performance and quicker acceleration; 
ECO® limits top speed and 
acceleration rates for a more relaxed, 
fuel-conserving ride.
• Finger Throttle (only on 600 ACE and 
900 ACE engines without Turbo): The 
throttle block can be rotate forward 
for use as a finger throttle, if preferred. 
Great for changing hand positions 
on a long ride and for more control 
through bumps.
I'll extract engine displacement, horsepower, track width, track length, suspension travel, and other technical specifications.

List all technical specifications with their values:

58  ACCESSORIES  SEATS & ACCESSORIES
HEATED DRIVER SEAT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202782
• Makes riding more comfortable even in the coldest temperatures.
• Heated seat option to 16” models
• Compatible with 1+1 Rack and Passenger Seats
• Requires Harness (860202740) to retrofit on Radien models.
2 UP LIGHT SEAT
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202568
• Extended seat providing convenient 2-up riding.
• Replaces existing seat in seconds.
• Battery Cover with Support (860201720) required for vehicle without battery.
• On vehicles equipped with a battery, attach LinQ anchor on 
top of stock battery cover, or use kit 860201720
2 UP SEAT WITH BACKREST
Radien² / Radien / Radien-X 400 mm
860202662
• The ultimate in modular seating.
• Allows quick changes between 1-up and 2-up riding.
• Ergonomically correct positions for driver and passenger.
• Two easy tool-less steps: 
      1 - Clip in seat. 
2 - Add LinQ 1 + 1 Backrest.
• Battery Cover with Support (860201720) required for vehicle without battery.
• Anchor kit available 860202059 (when owning 2 sleds and 
want to change this seat easily to another sled)
• On vehicles equipped with a battery, attach LinQ anchor on 
top of stock battery cover, or use kit 860201720
DEEP SNOW ULTRA-LIGHT SEAT
Radien² / Radien
860202909
• Underseat storage compartment for CVT belt
• Ultra-compact design for active riders.
• 127 mm height.
• Gripper style vinyl resists wear and tear and provides better control.
• Works with Seat Storage Box - 6 L (860202532).

FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  Advex Sport Radiant Helmet 
(DOT/ECE) with M-FORGE 
Composite shell.

with pivot contact system with 
integrated adjustable vent
•  Sun visor heated chamber.

LED light for added rider safety.

winter integrated communication

feature when plugged in

ADVEX SPORT HELMET

for winter integrated 
communication system

ADVEX HELMET – COMMON FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
•  4-year limited warranty.
•  Lightweight M-FORGE® 
Composite shell.
•  Innovative and safe full-
face access opening.
•  Adjustable and easily removable peak.
•  Retractable amber sun visor for the 
best vision in snow conditions.

guard mask system.

a better ﬁt and comfort.

•  Recyclable helmet shell for 
minimal environmental impact.
•  Aerodynamic shape to 
reduce neck fatigue.

NEW
664070 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

Lynx ADVEX Sport Helmet (DOT/ECE) 
with M-FORGE Composite shell
ADVEX SPORT HELMET
Black (90), Orange (12), White (01)
NEW
929079  
929125  
929129 • XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL
DESCRIPTION:
Advex Sport Helmet (DOT/ECE) 
with M-FORGE Composite shell. 
FEATURES AND TECHNOLOGIES:
• 4-year limited warranty.
•  Lightweight M-FORGE® Composite shell 
•  Innovative and safe full facae acces opening
•  Adjustable and easily removeable peak
•  Dual lens anti-fog visor with integrated adjustable vent
•  Retractable amber sun visor for best vision in snow conditions.
•  Prescription eyeglasses friendly.
•  Adjustable humidity extractor vents.
•  NCS System: Reduces noise
•  Optional side LED utility light.
•  Optional VIBE Mesh made for winter 
integrated communication system
•  Neck skirt to reduce air intrusion.
•  Humidity control with breathguard mask system
•  Operate all features with gloved hands.
•  2 shell sizes and 4 EPS size for better ﬁt and comfort.
•  Ratcheting quick-release chin strap.
•  Recyclable helmet shell for minimal environmental impact.
•  Aerodynamic shape to reduce neck fatigue.
•  1825 g ± for size large.
•  1895 g ± for size large with peak
•  D.O.T. and ECE 2206 certiﬁed
